Summary Heading: Good Hotel, but Not Much Nearby
Summary: Very nice business-class hotel.  Front desk service was very good.  Breakfast was served in a large, elegant room and there were many food choices.  There is not much nearby in terms of restaurants or stores.  Angel Stadium is a short drive away.
Manager Response: We're thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we do appreciate the many kind words you had for our services and staff! We hope this means you will be visiting us again in the future. Be well!

Summary: This is a wonderful stay for our group. We all enjoyed to stay here for last 3 days. Good location just very close to free way exit; This hotel has all good facilites like swimming pool, good Citizen Kitchen where we can have fantastic food.  All the hotel staff are very friendly, especailly Mr. Alex De La Serna, he made us quite comfortable, during our stay, he gave us good proposal to visit the city, arranging very nice car for us.
Manager Response: What a great review to read. We will make sure to recognize our staff member that went above and beyond to make your stay the best. Do visit us again soon so that we may continue our tradition of providing stellar service. Thank and safe travels.

Summary: We stayed here this past weekend for my birthday and it was the worst hotel experience I have ever had. My boyfriend had booked the room and called a few days in advance to request a king sized bed and the woman on the phone confirmed that this would be a possibility. When we arrived we were given the key to a room with two full sized beds. We called down to the desk and the staff member on the phone informed us that there were no king bed rooms available to switch to regardless of what the woman earlier in the week had promised us. The room was not the nicest either. The AC worked in reverse so that when it was set to high it was not very strong but when it was set to low it worked slightly better (emphasis on the slightly). The fridge looked very outdated and the beverages
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for what you experienced here in our hotel. What you have mentioned is not a clear representation of our standards and expectations. We strive very hard to have you leave us feeling even better than when you arrived. And in this case we did not meet that goal. I do hope that when your future travels bring you to the area, you will give as an opportunity to make it right for you.  Be well.

Summary: This hotel is great with big rooms, lovely pool area and restaurant. It is unfortunately right next to a busy motorway so is very noisy if you are on the road side of the building. The staff were lovely and a handy bus transferred us to Disney. Breakfast would have moved this hotel to 4 stars but there was a big mix up over what was gluten free and my child became ill as a result. The matter was dealt with very professionally by the manager.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. Although you satisfactorily enjoyed your stay we are disheartened to know that we did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to bring up your comments to the proper departments so that they may be able to resolve any issues that may hinder the enjoyment of our guests. Thank you again and our sincere apologies for the shortcomings. Be well.

Summary: This is great hotel.  Access to the rooms is from the outside but through a lobby first.  They have great little bar close to the pool and a very nice restaurant.    The rooms are very nice and comfortable.  It can be a bit noisy in the mornings when everyone is heading to breakfast.  It's a nice family friendly place.
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: Horrible customer service at the front desk. Rooms I guarantee at 3 PM, I got there at 3:30 there with no rooms available. I wasn't the only one that was another couple waiting too. Having two young kids with me, I asked the front desk to give me a call when my room is available. She told me"if it gets busy I might forget"!!!  On Thursday night after Disneyland, we got back to the hotel around midnight and the elevator wasn't working. My room was in the tower on the third floor. There was another lady that has been waiting too. No stairs, we were told that we needed the maintenance people to take us up the stairs. It took forever, then the elevators got fixed, without us knowing. All the stops were very rude. Except for that dining staffs during breakfast.
Manager Response: We are disheartened to hear about your mediocre stay with us. Please know that we have sent your comments to our proper departments. This is an opportunity for us to improve so that we will meet and exceed future guests' expectations. Be well.

Summary: We were dropping off our daughter at a nearby college and so decided to stay in this area.  We made sure to avoid Anaheim/Disney crowd so this was a good choice.  Free breakfast and parking (which is why we stayed here) but be warned it is literally along side a freeway AND the hotel room doors are accessed by outside balconies (versus in a building).  Good breakfast, helpful staff (I had trouble with the washing machine and they sent maintenance right over - he was a very nice man) and a lovely room.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review of your recent stay at The Hotel Fullerton.  It means so much not only to me, but to the entire team here at the Hotel, that you would share your recommendation of our property with the TripAdvisor community. I am delighted that we had the opportunity to welcome you at our hotel recently, and hope that we will have the pleasure of doing so again soon.

Summary: I stayed at the hotel fullerton for three days as rest place before travelling home to the united kingdom. the staff were welcoming and  our requests to be moved to the newly renovated rooms in the tower after our first night uncomfortable sleep in the chalet style rooms  the chalet rooms are somewhat dark and surround the swimming pool and garden area or car park. some of the furniture is somewhat tired and need replacing.   howver the urban kitchen and bar and staff made the happy hour go quickly and would recommend their company and food. The plans are to build a fine dining experience to the hotel in the near future, it caters also for big conference groups and specialise in foreigh tourism . near to freeway and to the town of fullerton is 5 min drive away where you will
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: In the past week, we have traveled through Illinois, Iowa, South Dakota, Wyoming, Colorado, New Mexico, Arizona and finally California. Yes, all of that in just a few days! Feel exhausted just reading that? Well, the perfect cure for this exhaustion is The Hotel Fullerton Anaheim. Located on the edge of Anaheim, California, The Hotel Fullerton Anaheim is just minutes from the Disneyland Resort, Anaheim Convention Center, and Cal State Fullerton. Our room was located on the 5th floor in the tower.  Guests can choose from standard, tower, and executive rooms or the presidential suite.  The furnishing is modern and sophisticated, yet not so fancy that you feel like you can’t touch anything.  The bathroom was spacious and the bed was super comfy. The room included wifi and Starbucks
Manager Response: Wow! What a great review to read! We're thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we do appreciate the many kind words you had for our services and staff! We hope this means you will be visiting us again in the future. Be well!

Summary: Actually,3.5 stars. In town for a family wedding. Overall, the hotel itself was nice enough. Room was comfortable with usual amenities including hair dryer and ironing board. Large bathroom. Staff was friendly and helpful. Average breakfast with eggs, bacon, sausage, hash, cereal. Hotel bar was newer and comfortable. Noticed stains on the lobby sofa and chairs. Hotel situated near the freeway (convenient) but was next door to an industrial park with semi trucks parked in the adjacent lot; this was the view from my room (back of the hotel).  No restaurants or convenience stores within walking distance. They offer shuttle service to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate you choosing us as your hotel while in the area attending a wedding.  We hope you will visit us again soon.  Be well.

Summary Heading: Great Alternative to Walking Distance Disneyland Area Hotels
Summary: We chose to stay at the Hotel Fullerton because the price was very reasonable and still quite close to the Disneyland Resort (10-15 min drive from the Mickey and Friends parking garage). Because we had a car and didn't have to go back to the hotel mid-day (we stayed in the parks all day), this made the most sense for us and saved us quite a bit of money.  The hotel was be a little hard to find - the street you turn onto from the main road has a very small street sign and the street itself is not so obvious. So keep a watchful eye for your turn!  We didn't spend too much time at the hotel since we spent all day in the parks, but it provided us with what we needed - clean, comfortable beds (two double beds) and a hot shower. Check-in was easy, and we were given room 136. Room 136
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for sharing your comments with the Tripadvisor community. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another stay.

Summary: Alex De La Serna was extremely helpful during a booking mix-up on my part, and he upgraded my room free of charge. He and the staff were so friendly and accommodating. It was a wonderful stay and I will definitely stay here again! =D
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for sharing your comments with the Tripadvisor community. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another stay.

Summary Heading: Avoid this hotel - staff unhelpful and rude
Summary: The breakfast starts at 6-9 AM. while 7-8:30 the breakfast room filled with group of oriental tourists. Very limited choices of breakfast then I asked one of the staff for 2 fried eggs and the other one turn to me with the sarcastic answer "this is the buffet line if you want to have fried egg so order at the restaurant 11:30 (with the bad tone)  Then look at the waffle maker, how bad they serving food here.
Manager Response: We apologize for the experience you had during your recent stay with us. What you have described is not indicative of the service and experience we strive to achieve with each and every one of our guests. We will take your comments under advisement in an effort to continually improve our services. Thank you and be well.

Summary: We've booked this hotel for four days. I'd say this a nice place to come "home" to after a whole day of fun exploring downtown LA or the theme parks. If you want peace and quiet and total rest, this is the hotel for you. The free shuttle to and from Disneyland was excellent. The manager on duty, Mr Alex Dela Serna, even drove us to Disnyland himself! He sure goes out of his way to extend good service to hotel guests! Kudos also to the shuttle drivers and those manning the front desk.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for sharing your comments with the Tripadvisor community. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another stay.

Summary: I had an awesome experience staying at the Hotel Fullerton. Everyone was helpful and very accommodating - from the people at the front desk to those cleaning the rooms. Alex, the manager, went above and beyond my expectations. He made sure that we got everything we need and our stay was comfortable. The shuttle drivers also deserve a pat in the back for being patient even when we're late for drop off. Thank you so much. I will definitely stay at this hotel again and recommend it to my friends.  Regards from OR, Arcie.
Manager Response: Wow! What a great review to read! We're thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we do appreciate the many kind words you had for our services and staff! We hope this means you will be visiting us again in the future. Be well!

Summary: This is NOT a family friendly hotel. I stayed along with my daughter and her friend (both age 9) because 1) the price and 2) close drive to Disneyland. Upon checking in we walked by the pool area where a heavily intoxicated couple were using profanity and having a full make out session (groping included). I shrugged it off. When we got to room  I could hear the other guests next door talking along with their TV (I am thinking not a good sign but I am trying to stay positive at this point). The girls fall asleep (thank goodness) but at 12 midnight I hear drunken stupor outside my door, a man and women yelling at each other about “being marijuana medicated.” I call the front desk and they say security is coming up…I don’t hear nothing for another thirty minutes then I hear loud
Manager Response: We apologize for the experience you had during your recent stay with us.  What you have described is not indicative of the service and experience we strive to achieve with each and every one of our guests.  We will take your comments under advisement in an effort to continually improve our services.  Thank you and be well.

Summary: Fullerton and Anaheim may not be noted for their sophistication but this hotel stands out as a superb example that would be accepted in any higher end locale.  The entire hotel, especially the lobby, reflects a subtle upscale style.  It is clean, modern, and functional, with all the expected amenities including pool, garden, conference rooms, restaurants, free wifi, free business center, plenty of parking, and it is ideally situated to the interstates.  My girlfriend and I stayed for 4 nights in early May and  took advantage of the included scrumptious breakfast buffet starting at 6am every morning.  There was the usual eggs, meats, potatoes, cold and hot cereals, fruits, pastries, and juices, but in addition we were met each morning with a unique surprise dish.  I especially
Manager Response: Wow!  What a great review to read!  We're thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we do appreciate the many kind words you had for our services and staff!  We hope this means you will be visiting us again in the future.  Be well!

Summary: I stayd at the Fullerton Hotel for 4 nights in May 2017. It was a package with breakfast included for $10 more. I had a single King Bedroom in the remodeled Tower wing, facing the back of the hotel, which is not as noisy as the front (the front faces a busy highway). Checkin was a breeze. They always have 1-2 staff at the frontdesk all day and night. The room was moderately spacious, TV had over 30 channels, WiFi was free and fairly fast (password provided). There was a small fridge, small couch and writing desk. Real porcelain cups and glasses (2 of each) were provided. Bathroom was a little on the small side, but good for 1-2 persons. Standard ammenities included hairdryer and moisturizer. There was a mid-size pool (good eough for swimming laps) and heated jacuzzi open till
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for sharing your comments with the Tripadvisor community. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another stay.

Summary: Staff was so nice and helpful from the front desk to the shuttle drivers. They were so accommodating and our kids had a great time. Good breakfast buffet. Easy central location. Free Shuttle to Disneyland was nice.
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read!  We are pleased to hear that our staff was nice and helpful to you and your family.  Please come back and see us again soon.  Be well!

Summary: We stayed at The Hotel Fullerton for one night to join our tour to SF the following day. It was a pleasant surprise to find this hotel as advertised. The room and bathroom were nice, comfy and clean. It's also always good to have free coffee in the room.   We met Alex, the night manager, who was very gracious to help us get the supplies we needed to do our laundry in the hotel's coin operated laundry room. He even provided us bottles of water while we did our laundry.   It was great to get some rest at The Hotel Fullerton after a long day!
Manager Response: We're happy to hear that Alex was able to assist you with your laundry, and that you enjoyed your stay overall with us.  We hope this means you will come back and visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Loud and attendants stood around and talked
Summary: The outside of the hotel looks nice. Once inside the rooms were clean and nice. However the people above and outside were very loud. Doors slamming and not security to monitor.  The attendants were always talking outside my room as i was on the corner by their work station area. They were loud at all times of their work shift.  The food was good from the restaurant that i ordered for my room.  The free breakfast was nice however the people that were in that area were extremely rude and pushy. They walked in front of you and didn't wait their turn.
Manager Response: We apologize for the experience you had recently staying with us.  What you described is not representative of the standards we strive to maintain.  We hope you will afford us another opportunity to make it right for you in the future.  Be well.

Summary: We decided to book at this hotel after reading some of the reviews.  Although we come to southern CA often, we always tend to stay at one of the "brand" hotels and until now did not venture away from the "brand."  We are glad we did.    In the Southern California culture where overt brashness and glitz dominate, this hidden , understated, classy gem offers quality food, people, and atmosphere.  Simple sophistication at its finest.  It's genuine.  I know the word "genuine"  scares a lot of people in southern CA, but in my book that's a good thing.    No, this is not the Hotel Ritz, and it does not pretend to be.  However, you will be treated to a clean, comfortable room with a wonderful pool, bar, and restaurant.  It's genuine in a culture where all things genuine are lacking.
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read! We are ecstatic Edward, Natalia and Erik were able to take care of you and your party while you were staying with us! We certainly do appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Be well!

Summary Heading: Perfect end to our USA travels
Summary: Having been on a 3 week tour of the USA we chose the Hotel Fullerton as our final stop as we visited LA and the surrounding areas.    Having arrived at the hotel we were welcomed by a friendly member of staff at reception who took all the usual details and payment.  We had to pay a 20% deposit which we hadn't anticipated but other than that everything went exactly as expected.  The room was a touch dated but was a decent size and had two comfortable double beds, a tv, fridge, coffee making facilities and a clean bathroom with a good shower and amenities.  The room was also equipped with air conditioning which we made full use of.  There was an outdoor pool with some loungers and free pool towels.  I'm not sure if it is always quiet at the pool but it certainly was when we were
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. I am so glad that you had such an enjoyable stay with us at The Hotel Fullerton. It's wonderful hearing you say that you enjoyed the facilities, but even more so that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team - I will be sure to share your compliments with all. Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the Hotel very soon.

Summary: I booked Hotel Fullerton for a business event. My experience as well as office teammates were delighted with the attention and professionalism given on behalf of staff. They were very accommodating and very helpful throughout our event.  Starting from Event coordinator, Alex , he did an excellent Job representing the hotel as well as making me feel comfortable and and addressing every concern and need i had for my event. He make me feel like we were friends from a while ago. I really appreciate him as well as all the staff.  Will definitely keep Fulerton hotel in mind for future events. !!!
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. I am so glad that you had such an enjoyable stay with us at The Hotel Fullerton. It's wonderful hearing you say that you found the hotel to be comfortable, but even more so that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team - I will be sure to share your compliments with all. Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the Hotel very soon.

Summary: The Fullerton Hotel is quite a pleasant hotel. Very nice rooms, very friendly staff, Great buffet breakfast included. Will definitely stay there again, without question. The Hotel is literally right off the 91 freeway, very easy to find and access.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for sharing your comments with the Tripadvisor community. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another stay.

Summary: Very friendly frontdesk. Especially Alex is very friendly and helpfull. The rooms are nice and clean. The beds are comfortable and the matrace is good. The restaurant is very good. Made special meal for our son.
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. I am so glad that you had such an enjoyable stay with us at The Hotel Fullerton. It's wonderful hearing you say that you found the hotel to be comfortable, but even more so that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team - I will be sure to share your compliments with all. Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the Hotel very soon.

Summary: Arrived earlier than expected, and my room was ready. Clean rooms, housekeeping staff attentive, front desk staff was ok. Had an issue with the shuttle. Hotel Details say the shuttle runs to and from Disneyland from 7am-11pm (with a few break times listed) however one morning we were told the shuttle was full when in fact they were just not taking guests over to disneyland only corporate people to their offices. We ended up having to UBER over because we did not know (pretty inconvenient). I suggest you change the hotel detail sheet that is given at check in if the shuttle is only to be used for corporate purposes mid-week as we may have chosen to stay elsewhere.....closer to the park. If you are going to Disney, I don't recommend staying here. Would also like to see friendlier
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for sharing your comments with the Tripadvisor community. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another stay.

Summary: My husband and I arrived for a rather late check-in after a fun, but long and exhausting, day at Disneyland.   Alex helped us at the front desk and provided truly exceptional service. He was friendly, professional, answered all of our questions, and checked us in quickly - a blessing when you've been on your feet for the better part of 10 hours.   The room was lovely and comfortable. Room temperature control worked well and the low hum of the ac unit was a nice white noise to fall asleep too. The bed was comfortable as well with plenty of pillows.   The hotel is a little out of the way from Disney (about a 13 min ride), but that too was nice after a long day there. The area is quiet and, after being around sound all day, it was exactly what I needed. Worth noting for families
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. I am so glad that you had such an enjoyable stay with us at The Hotel Fullerton. It's wonderful hearing you say that you found the hotel to be comfortable, but even more so that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team - I will be sure to share your compliments with all.  Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the Hotel very soon.

Summary: My boyfriend and I were visiting California for 6 days and 5 nights.  We were able to check in the hotel earlier than the check-in time which we were grateful for. The staff at the hotel were kind and accommodating. We received vouchers for free breakfast for all 5 days, which was a bonus. (Monday-Thursday: 6AM-9AM, Weekends: 6AM-10:30AM).   The downside about this hotel is that it's near the middle of nowhere as well as the highway. My boyfriend and I didn't have a car so we had to uber everywhere.  Note: The hotel provides a free shuttle to and from Disneyland!   The room seemed kind of old, the faucet in the bathroom for the sink would make a screeching sound every time I turned it on and it took a while for the water to get running. The room had a slight wet laundry smell to
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for what you experienced here in our hotel. What you have mentioned is not a clear representation of our standards and expectations. We strive very hard to have you leave us feeling even better than when you arrived. And in this case we did not meet that goal. I do hope that when your future travels bring you to the area, you will give as an opportunity to make it right for you.  Be well.

Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Fullerton for 4 nights. The staff in all areas of the hotel were extremely friendly. Buffet was awesome and for us it was complimentary. Rooms are roomy and clean. Pool was heated so that was great for the Grandkids. Shuttle was great, you just need to book it an hour in advance.  There isnt any restaurants or stores near by if you do not have a car. Overall great experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit your review.  We are happy to hear that our staff was friendly and accommodating, and that you enjoyed the buffet breakfast and our complimentary Disneyland shuttle.  Please do come and visit us again soon.  Be well.

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful. Room was very nice and clean. Parking is easy and I like that it is close to everything I need or want to do while in Cali. I did not the buffet.  It is not worth the high praise that is charged.  Will not do that next time.  Their restaurant "Citizen's Kitchen" tries to be high class. Would rather have a normal restaurant.  I will be back to stay at this hotel. I will just need to go out to eat.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the buffet breakfast and Citizen Kitchen.  We take great pride in the changes and improvements we have made to both of these areas.  I apologize if we did not meet your expectations in these departments.  We do appreciate your feedback.  Be well.

Summary: The staff was very accommodating. Beautifully designed hotel, I absolutely loved the lounge area, just wish it had a better views. 5 star room service, very impressive menu. Best part was late checkout runs till 1 PM
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your excellent review. We're pleased that we were able to accommodate your party to an early check in, and that Alex was so hospitable towards you! Your kind feedback is greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome​ you soon for another incredible stay!

Summary: Room was good! Service was good! Location and free shuttle to and from Disneyland was great. My boyfriend and I enjoyed this hotel and liked how the room was and the free parking. We aren't really picky just as long as it's clean and in a good area. Ac/heater was a little loud but not something that would make or break our trip. 4 stars due to the fact that the security deposit was a little much (100$) but we were prepared for it. As long as your prepared for the security deposit then you're all good! 4 stars also because we wished there was a continental breakfast. But overall, we left very happy!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for sharing your comments with the Tripadvisor community. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another stay.

Summary Heading: Clean and off the main road
Summary: The room is a decent size however if you are staying with more then 2 occupants I would recommend a second room we had three and the beds were double size and we were very squished the beds arnt the most comfterable but the room is clean, very out dated with the noisiest heater/ aircon I've ever heard, there is laundry facilities on site coin operated however when I need more coins for the machines the front desk didn't have any and told me to go to the bar and the bar didn't want to give me any coins so not very helpful and since your away from anything going to find coins is a challenge. The breakfast was included for us and was descent there was always food and drinks available. Joe the bus driver was great he tells jokes but he is the t only nice staff member we met at this
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words, and thank you for sharing them with the entire Tripadvisor community. We appreciate the sentiments! Thank you and be well!

Summary: Decided to stay at The Hotel Fullerton because of the convenient access to Disneyland. There was a mistake in our room and the night manager, Alex, helped us by accommodating our needs. He was really understanding and helpful. Overall, the hotel was very clean and well managed. It was a very pleasant and nice stay for a short getaway!
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read! We are ecstatic to hear that Alex was able to take care of you and your party while you were staying with us! We certainly do appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Be well!

Summary: It was very pleasant experience! The hotel was very nice and smells fresh and clean... except there was a guest who was loud outside and talking on the phone for an hour and it was early in the morning, disturbing noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for sharing your comments with the Tripadvisor community. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another stay.

Summary: We arrived very early at the hotel, and were tired and hungry, but could not check into the room yet. Tyler(?) the front desk staff eased our arrival at the hotel by letting us have a complimentary breakfast at the buffet. She was cordial and helpful in answering our questions.   Alex, the night manager, was exceptionally friendly and helpful in accommodating our requests. Alex is one of the nicest hotel staff we have met so far in our travels, and greatly improved our impression of the hotel.   The shuttle service to Disneyland was convenient, but there doesn't seem to be much to do in the area (other than going to Disneyland).   Overall, this is a great hotel to stay at if you want to go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read! We are ecstatic Alex and Tyler were able to take care of you and your party while you were staying with us! We certainly do appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Be well!

Summary Heading: Sir Alex De La Serna, fantastic job!
Summary: My family and I booked a tour and we were put at the Hotel Fullerton Anaheim for the night before our tour started. On the mentioned date, we were supposed to have a straight 6-8 hour flight from Montreal to Los Angeles. However, the flight got delayed and we stopped at Las Vegas before finally (after 12 hours) arriving in Los Angeles. Exhausted and tired, we finally managed to arrive at the hotel. Upon, arriving, Sir Alex welcomed us right away. In my family's previous hotel experiences, they would glare at us and leave us dumbfounded. However, Sir Alex's greeting made it comfortable to converse, as he told us all the things we need to know before we even ask for it (WiFi password, gym, pool, Citizen Kitchen, Breakfast in the morning, etc.) He also introduced the hotel's
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your excellent review. We're pleased that we were able to accommodate your party to an early check in, and that Alex was so hospitable towards you! Your kind feedback is greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome​ you soon for another incredible stay!

Summary Heading: Alex De La Serna outstanding Night Manager
Summary: I visited the hotel to meet my friend and I was lost, Alex gave me precise and easy to follow direction to the hotel. When I arrived at the hotel Alex welcome me with most friendliest and professional gesture. I had travel quite a bit but I will say Alex is the nicest Manager I met so far. Overall the Hotel, room are nice and clean.
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read! We are ecstatic Alex was able to take care of you and your party while you were staying with us! We certainly do appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Be well!

Summary: I booked here because the New Years Eve party I attended was at this hotel. I'm in the hospitality industry, so I'm fairly particular. I was very impressed from the moment I saw the hotel as I drove up to it. I was also impresses with the lobby, the friendliness of the staff & my room was beautiful. I also liked that there were restaurants in the hotel & that they had a free shuttle to Disneyland. The pool was also nice, but too cold to use it. Also, wifi was free & easy to use. My room was clean & very close to the elevator. I enjoyed the free in-room coffee with enough for 4 servings, including regular & decaf.  I would definitely stay here again & would recommend to others.
Manager Response: What a great review to read!  We appreciate you spending your New Year's with us!  We are glad you had a good time and enjoyed our property.  Please come back soon!  Be well.

Summary Heading: great place, rich breakfast, clean rooms
Summary: one word: perfect. we spent pleasant week with friendly stuff in nice room. This hotel is family friendly, we used complimenary hotel shuttle to disneypark. Breakfast was rich as kings table. Large tv set with hbo.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review of our hotel.  We appreciate you sharing your experience with the Tripadvisor community.  We hope you come visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Alex is the best manager ever
Summary: I stay in this hotel for weeks  while I found an apartment, I got to say that I was amazed by the quality of service and the overall experience. This hotel can has more character that any Marriott, Hilton I stayed. the service is very quick and profesional. the food in the hotel restaurant is great and the night manager Alex is the nicest guy in the hole county, not joking. If you are looking for quality time with family or friends, this hotel is the best option by far.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review regarding the food and the professionalism exhibited by Alex.  As you can see by the numerous reviews we receive regarding Alex and his excellent service, we are not surprised he was able to take care of your needs.  Please do come visit us again when your travels bring you to the area.  Be well.

Summary: Some friends were on a tour group that stayed here, the tour did not include Outlet shopping so I asked the manager (Alex) for help.  I cannot thank Alex enough for arranging an affordable shuttle bus for them and patiently answering all our questions about the area.  We were greeted right away by the front desk staff and Alex came out immediately with a bottle of water and a warm greeting.  He gave me his cell phone number and business card and said to call him if I needed any help whatsoever.  I am impressed with the professionalism and sincere greeting by Alex and the front desk staff.  The rooms were clean and to the point if you were just spending the night and not hanging around.  I would recommend this place for anyone planning a Disney Vacation or staying in the
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words about our hotel and especially Alex, our 'superstar' here at the hotel.  We're always pleased when we hear comments regarding his exemplary service and attitude, and I am happy that he was able to take care of your needs during your stay with us.  We do hope that you will visit us again soon!

Summary: ME and My friends have been sincerely impressed by the warm Welcome of Alex the night shift Manager! Absolutely loved the experience OF staying In this hotel!!!!  I Will certainly be staying here again!!
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read! We are ecstatic to hear that Alex was able to take care of you and your party while you were staying with us! We certainly do appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Be well!

Summary: Alex, the night manager was very accommodating to us from day one. He always make sure we have everything we need and gave us a homey environment during our stay at the hotel fullerton. Very friendly and we couldn't ask for anything more.
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read! We are ecstatic to hear that Alex was able to take care of you and your party while you were staying with us! We certainly do appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Be well!

Summary: Hotel is very nice, rooms are spacious and clean, swimming pool open till late evening. But whats best in this hotel are people working there - very nice, helpful and kind. I totally enjoyed my long stay there (few weeks in total).  Special thanks to Alex De La Serna (Night Manager) who is the nicest and most helpful person I have ever met in the hotel in my life.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words about the hotel and our service! We take great pride in our entire service team and product, and we will make sure your kind words are shared with the hotel service team. Visit us again soon! Be well.

Summary: This hotel is excellent value for money. It's not a luxury resort, but it doesn't market and price itself that way. The rooms are spacious and clean, the pool is pleasant and well-maintained, and staff are friendly and helpful with guest requests. The design is modern and what you'd expect from contemporary Californian architecture.  It is particularly suitable for travellers with a rental car who drive in the Los Angeles region, since it provides free parking and easy access to the freeway. I've seen others reviews complain about the noise coming from the freeway nearby, but personally I couldn't confirm that it interfered with my sleep, so I wouldn't hold that against the hotel.   In terms of location, there's not really much nearby that would warrant a longer stay, except for
Manager Response: Thank you again for coming and staying with us! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed yourself. Be well!

Summary: I stayed here for 3 night in a group of tour consisted of 17 people from Nov 9 to 11, 2016. The bed was OK, clean and comfortable, bathroom was nice and the staff were nice and helpful.  But I was very disappointed with the breakfast menu. The menu was very limited only consisted of bake potatoes, bacon, egg, bread and fruit (melon and water melon). The hotel served the same menu for 3 days in a row. I also found that the hotel far from attraction center, but it provided shuttle bus to Disney land upon reservation. No public transportation available,  If you want to go around the city by yourself, you have to reserve taxi from the hotel and it quite expensive or alternatively you have to use uber taxi.
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear that our breakfast buffet was not up to your standards.  We do our best to keep rotating items in order to avoid serving the same thing over and over.  We will take your comments under advisement in an effort to improve this service in the future.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Great place, lovely service, great food
Summary: If your looking for a stop in Anaheim this is it. Great service, arrange tours (ask for Alex) they serve amazing food, amazing. Pool and hot tubs great, rooms lovely, well serviced. Great stop in LA.  There is a Walmart nearby,
Manager Response: Wow! What a great review to read! We're ecstatic that you found everything to your satisfaction. If your travels bring you to the immediate area again soon, we do hope you will choose us again! Thank you and be well!

Summary: Felt very welcome from the beginning. Clean rooms, accommodating staff. Joe the shuttle driver was the highlight--he made us feel welcome and loved. Shuttle service will get you to park on a flexible schedule for free!
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read! We are ecstatic to hear that Joe was able to take care of you and your party while you were staying with us! We certainly do appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Be well!

Summary: This is our third stay here. Hip yet delish restaurant (we had deconstructed Caesar with broccoli to start, I had a wonderful organic chicken dinner),  beautiful breakfast buffet, super comfy bedding. These guys really do their best to please. What's not to like?
Manager Response: Thank you again for coming and staying with us!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed yourself.  Be well!

Summary: This hotel is near the freeway and easy access to get to Disneyland and knots berry farm.  has a restaurant inside that has 5 star food and great prices.  All the hotel staff and restaurant staff are more than accommodating to anyone's needs.  They have a very nice pool and spa, there is a garden type area with a lot of trees and lights.... very calming.  I would definitely give this hotel a 10+.  You will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: What a great review to read! We're ecstatic that you found everything to your satisfaction. If your travels bring you to the immediate area again soon, we do hope you will choose us again! Thank you and be well!

Summary: I was in the area for one night and was having a hard time finding a chain hotel that had rooms available and was affordable.  I drove past this and thought it looked nice so I called. The manager Alex was great on the phone and gave me a couple of choices of rooms, I decided on the 2 double beds because it was $40 cheaper than a king.  I was driving so I couldn't give him a credit card but told him I was on my way so he held the room for me. Once we arrived Alex was extremely pleasant and helpful. We were down by the front desk several times and every time he greeted me by my name ( I have never been to a hotel where they bother to remember your name) . I had assumed breakfast was included since it is in so many hotels, I was wrong, it was 13.95 per person, but he was able to
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words about the hotel and our service! We take great pride in our entire service team and product, and we will make sure your kind words are shared with the hotel service team. Visit us again soon! Be well.

Summary: Room was ok, considering the price. Very near to the Disneyland. Staff were very helpful and friendly especially Alex. Love him! HE will try to accommodate your request at this best and always full of smile. Breakfast was below average. Might as well go to IHOP
Manager Response: I'm sorry that the breakfast was below your standards, but am happy to hear that the staff (and especially Alex) were able to take care of you!  We hope you will come back and visit us again soon.  Be well.

Summary: My husband and I with our twins visited California for the first time! Let me start with the shuttle service, exceptional with Alex and our morning driver Joe, above and beyond service! The staff were all very nice, not too keen on the restaurant though, no kid friendly dishes. The breakfast buffet was hot and good. Alex the night manager helped us plan our road trip to El Matador beach in Malibu! Great guy! The rooms were satisfactory, the only thing was the presence of ants.
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read! We are ecstatic Alex and Joe were able to take care of you and your party while you were staying with us! We certainly do appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Be well!

Summary: My husband booked this hotel for his birthday solely because of the many reviews of amazing service. Unfortunately, this was not our experience. We were helped by Ingrid- who aside from not really being friendly at all (even after I complimented her glasses), DOWNgraded our room without so much as an apology. We booked a room with a king size bed. As she checked us in, she actually confirmed that with us. After processing our reservation she handed us the keys and said, "It's actually going to be a queen. We don't have any more king size rooms available". That was it. No apology. No attempt to make it right. She then instructed us to park around back and told us there was a closer entrance back there. When my husband asked where around back, she pointed behind her and said,
Manager Response: My sincere apologies for the inconveniences you experienced here during your recent visit with us.  This is certainly not representative of the standards of excellence we exhibit.  We are currently researching your comments more thoroughly in order to insure that this type of experience does not happen again in the future.  I do hope that if your travels bring you back to the area, you will afford us the opportunity to make it right for you.  Be well.

Summary: Hotel located near the freeways but didn't hear any traffic noise inside. Their rooms are clean and comfortable. The food of their restaurant are good with very reasonable prices. Also free shuttle bus to downtown Disneyland.
Manager Response: Wow! What a great review to read! We're ecstatic that you found everything to your satisfaction. If your travels bring you to the immediate area again soon, we do hope you will choose us again! Thank you and be well!

Summary: This hotel is very convenient in access to freeways and close to many attractions in the area.  The rooms are well appointed and with good amenities.  The staff are friendly and courteous. A pleasant surprise.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words about the hotel and our service! We take great pride in our entire service team and product, and we will make sure your kind words are shared with the hotel service team. Visit us again soon! Be well.

Summary: My wife,my sister and I were in town for my high school's reunion. I went on trip advisor to get ideas of highly rated hotels in Fullerton. The hotel Fullerton was rated #1 in fullerton so we booked it. We went to a late dinner at the in house restaurant.  We had requested a special order and the chef came out to clarify the request. His name was Zach and he was amazing! He made our special order to perfection and made an excellent recommendation for a wine pairing with the dish.  Zach made our dining experience a very pleasant one. We were not expecting such high quality food at reasonable prices. Zach is a great asset to the hotel Fullerton staff. I would highly recommend going to try out some of Zach' s creations. You won't be disappointed. I promise!
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read! We are ecstatic Zach was able to take care of you and your party while you were staying with us! We certainly do appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Be well!

Summary: Great hotel and location. Very neat and tidy but above all that the hotel manager preaches customer service. Did I already mentioned customer service?! He will go above and beyond. We will definitely come back!!!
Manager Response: Wow! What a great review to read! We're ecstatic that you found everything to your satisfaction. If your travels bring you to the immediate area again soon, we do hope you will choose us again! Thank you and be well!

Summary: Everyone was quite friendly, and the hotel was conveniently located. Despite being very close to the 91 freeway, there was no traffic noise when the sliding door was closed. The only silly thing is the "executive" rooms - they're the same as other rooms, but come with nicer coffee, a robe, and two bottles of water. Not really worth the upgrade, in my opinion. However, when I inquired with the front desk, they were able to resolve the issue appropriately. No major complaints.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for sharing your comments with the Tripadvisor community. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another stay.

Summary: I am very impressed with the type of service we had with Alex. He was very polite and very friendly. He goes above and beyond to make sure that we was doing ok. We will definetly return to hotel fullerton again. ALOHA

Summary: I went to this as hotel in Business, for that reason i was few time there, but the staff was very good, mainly Mr Alex that was always available and huge profissional!👏👍 i ll return for sure! Thank You

Summary: We are here for a 3 days business rally..we arrived late but we were greeted by a very enthusiastic employee! His name was Alex de la Cerna. He was very helpful and made sure that we got the best room and best rate! He explained everything very well and even helped us find the best restaurant that is still open late. This hotel have good restaurant that serves good breakfast and just 15 mins from downtown disney! I will highly recommend this place because of location, good rooms and facilities and very accommodating employees!
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read! We are ecstatic Alex was able to take care of you and your party while you were staying with us! We certainly do appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Be well!

Summary: I've been to Hotel Fullerton Anaheim for two consecutive years and I have always  enjoyed my stay for many reasons. (From Sep 8-11, 2016. First,  the staff especially the night manager, Mr. Alex De La Serna who has always been attentive to our needs. He always made sure our needs are accommodated. On the night of our event, we needed a cart to carry some musical equipment- the staff were busy but Alex did not hesitate- he got the cart himself and went to the second floor to load our equipment. That's a mark of a good leader- who will step up when his staff is busy.  Switching room is not always easy but Guillermina of the front desk made it a breeze. The housekeeping staff were also wonderful and so did the staff at the Red Restaurant.  The amenities are perfect. The linens and
Manager Response: We are overjoyed to hear that you enjoyed a wonderful stay with us in Fullerton. We love to hear that your event went well, and that Alex and Guille were able to help you during your stay. We look forward to greeting you in the future for another excellent stay!

Summary: The room was really spacious, which was serviced each day with new towels, and cleaned, Alex on the front desk was amazing helping us to book baseball tickets, overall a good experience. We had food at the hotel one night which was really great with a good choice of food, the breakfast was a buffet choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your guest room. Thank you for sharing your comments with the Tripadvisor community. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another five-star stay.

Summary: My girlfriend and I decided to to stay here from a long trip. Right from the very start the I was greeted with a friendly staff name Alex. He is accommodating, friendly, and thorough with our stay. Our room is nice and super clean. Highly recommend this hotel. Thanks again Alex!
Manager Response: Wow! What a great review to read! We're ecstatic that you found everything to your satisfaction. If your travels bring you to the immediate area again soon, we do hope you will choose us again! Thank you and be well!

Summary: We visited CA from 8/19 to 8/27 and one of our most pleasant experience was at The Hotel Fullerton and especially night manager Alex De La Serna.. Alex provided excellent customer service even though it was late in the day and was very easy to communicate to! He is truly an asset to the hotel.

Summary: The whole staff at the Hotel Fullerton were FANTASTIC! The shuttle driver Buddy was friendly and on time. The manager Alex took care of us when we had to leave a horrible hotel in the middle of the night. Also, the chef Zach is an ARTIST! Best chicken and char we have ever had. He even brought us out free wine and a chocolate desert to celebrate our anniversary. We will come back to this hotel again and again.

I'm so sorry that the beginning of your travels found you in less desirable accommodations, but am happy to hear that we were able to take care of you here, from Alex and the guest services team to Zach and his stellar crew at Citizen Kitchen!  We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Be well!

Summary: So I lived in room 149 with free breakfast. The dinner at Citizen Kitchen is very tasty and price is reasonable. There is free laundry, swimming pool and gym. I especially recommend you to ask night manager called Alex for help. He is very kind and patient, he's passionate about his job, and he makes me feel like I am at home.
Manager Response: We are overjoyed to hear that you enjoyed a wonderful stay with us in Fullerton. We love to hear that you enjoyed our restaurant Citizen Kitchen, and that Alex was able to help you during your stay. We look forward to greeting you in the future for another excellent stay!

Summary: We came a little early to check in, but was accommodated as soon as a room became available The night duty manager Alex was very pleasing, we were greeted at night when we came back from having dinner, asked us to see if we need anything, made sure that we are satisfied with their service.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your excellent review. We're pleased that we were able to accommodate your party to an early check in, and that Alex was so hospitable towards you!  Your kind feedback is greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome​ you soon for another incredible stay!

Summary: Stellar hospitality and customer service at the front desk from Alex de la Serna, who also upgraded us to a larger room (thanks again!) Great room, super clean. I would definitely recommend this place to everyone.
