Summary Heading: the service in this hotel is exceellent
Summary: I came from Maryland to travel here and living in Fullerton. I was introduced by me trip group. Although it's a little bit far from the downtown, living here I found safely, comfortable quiet and warm. The room I live is big and clean, with good condition in every equipments. The service is great here ,which helps me a lot, including telling how I can get to downtown to travel and where I can go near here and in the downtown LA. Alex is very friendly and polite, as well as helping me a lot about the living and foods, and would like to talk with me about my trips, my days, my works, etc. I just have some requirement that it'd better to have free laundry. Wish it to be nice all the time and guests here have a good time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We love to hear that you found our staff to be friendly and helpful. We hope to welcome you soon for another excellent​ stay in Fullerton!

Summary: I stayed here with a friend recently for our tour of LAs theme parks. The service was excellent staff polite and friendly from the moment we walked in and couldn't do enough to help. The room was tidy and comfortably sized with very generous beds. The grounds are beautiful with the garden being like an oasis and providing a nice view for the restaurant. The Disneyland shuttle is very convenient and the driver Joe was on time and reliable. The onsite restaurant Citizen Kitchen was amazing with great service and impeccable food perhaps a little fancy for those with more plain tastes but I certainly enjoyed. The hotel does seem further out but is excellent value.
Manager Response: Wow! What a great review to read! We're ecstatic that you found everything to your satisfaction. If your travels bring you to the immediate area again soon, we do hope you will choose us again! Thank you and be well!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for Disneyland and all of the area
Summary: My girlfriend and her two little sisters who are 4 and 2 stayed here for 2 nights this past weekend and it was an excellent stay. The hotel is really comfortable with pretty big rooms and comfortable beds. The food is above what I expected from a hotel. The breakfast buffet is excellent as well. You know the hotel is good when the only negative thing you can think about is that the restaurant didn't have ranch!  Also, I want to say thank you to Joe, our shuttle driver. He was so entertaining and we held a conversation the entire way to Disneyland. My girlfriend even left her wallet in the van and he drove all the way back to just to drop it off. Joe, thanks man. The Uncommon Common Sense. I remember the name of the book!  I will be staying here again next time I go to
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read!  We are ecstatic that our team member Joe was able to take care of you and your party while you were staying with us!  We certainly do appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Be well!

Summary Heading: It's nice to stay in this Hotel
Summary: Very nice service, very polite and helpful staff. A night Manager Alex is amazing person.  There is nice swimming pool and restaurant in Hotel. Breakfast is delicious.  Rooms pretty clean. The only back side of Hotel a bit nosy in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words, and thank you for sharing them with the entire Tripadvisor community.  We appreciate the sentiments!  Thank you and be well!

Summary: I called Duty Manager Alex and asked for let e park the car on their parking lot as I was taking tour from that Hotel. He was very courteous and prompt and let me park my Van free of charge. Hotel staff was also very nice and property was very clean. I would go again and recommend to everyone.
Manager Response: I'm happy to hear that we were able to accommodate your request for parking.  Please do visit us again soon.  Be well.

Summary: Really enjoyed my stay at this quiet location. The room was very clean, staff very friendly. The gardens are so beatiful. The bed felt like its bones needed to be put to rest lol. Overall I will return
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review of your recent stay at The Hotel Fullerton. It means so much not only to me, but to the entire team here at the Hotel, that you would share your recommendation of our property with the TripAdvisor community. I am delighted that we had the opportunity to welcome you at our hotel recently, and hope that we will have the pleasure of doing so again soon.

Summary Heading: Taking my son to Cal State Fullerton
Summary: This hotel is really beautiful and the price was unreal. The rooms were spotless and stylish, the bar and restaurant were really nice, and it's only 4 miles from CSUF. The beds were a little hard, but still comfy. Nice staff and close to so much! Will stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words and review! We are so pleased you thoroughly enjoyed your recent getaway, and ecstatic that you chose The Hotel Fullerton for it! Please visit us again soon!

Summary: Good position (actually more than just "good") for visiting all the attractions, good services, perfectly clean! What else?  It's slightly expensive but it's way within the average of the other hotels around at the same time of the year. Good breakfast, pool is what you really need after a working day (or a day walking around LA's attractions) and spa is really relaxing. Quite, clean, good service and good position! I do recommend it either for a vacation or for business.
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read! We are ecstatic that you enjoyed your stay so much, and thrilled that the service exceeded your expectations. We hope this means you will come back and see us again soon! Have a great day!

Summary: Hotel Fullerton is a wonderful place for a vacation. We stayed here for a debut back in March and now back again for summer vacation. The night manager, Alex, was accommodating and professional. His attention to details in costumer service is fabulous.  I recommend anyone in Anaheim to book with The Fullerton Hotel!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very good hotel to discover LA from
Summary: Different from chain hotels this place offers a sincere environment. The rooms are comfortable and pool & hot-tub is perfect for relaxing after a tiring day of LA. They also serve really good burgers.
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read! We are ecstatic that you enjoyed your stay so much, and thrilled that the service exceeded your expectations. We hope this means you will come back and see us again soon! Have a great day!

Summary: It's nice to get a break from all the big-chain hotels and stay at a boutique place once in a while. Great service, friendly staff, clean facilities. Shout out to Alex for the smooth and accommodating check-in.  My only negative comment is that on some parts of the hallways the carpets had this distinct old carpet smell. Other than that, everything was great.
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. It's wonderful hearing you say that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team, especially Alex - I will be sure to share your compliments with all. Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the hotel very soon. Thank you and be well.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay at a reasonable price
Summary: The Hotel Fullerton was our base for a 9 night break in the LA area. We chose it due to the location and the great price.  The hotel is just off the highway and away from the hustle and bustle of Anaheim but only a short journey to the local attractions.   Hotel staff were always very friendly and helpful, our twin room was of a good size with comfortable beds.   Our booking included a buffet breakfast, which offered a good selection of hot and cold food.  The outdoor pool was nice, however the hot tub was closed for most of our stay.  The hotel gym was very basic.  Would have no hesitation to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words and review! We are so pleased you thoroughly enjoyed your recent getaway, and ecstatic that you chose The Hotel Fullerton for it! Please visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Will never stay at this hotel again
Summary: The price of our room was $153 dollars. The room we stayed in was not worth that price. You can hear every person walk by your room. There were screaming kids down at the pool you could hear from your room until the pool closed at 10pm. The AC in the room did not work well. The toilet seat was broken. The room was small for the price it cost. The next morning we found out unless you arrange with your booking ahead of time breakfast is an extra $13.85 in the Red room. I will never stay at this hotel again!! Very bad experience!
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that we did not meet your expectations regarding your recent stay with us.  We take great pride in being able to offer extraordinary guest service and comfortable clean and affordable accommodations.  We do hope that if your travels b ring you back to the area, that you give us another chance to exceed your expectations.  Thank you and be well.

Summary: We had an amazing stay at the Hotel Fullerton. We were planning to stay just for two days and we ended up staying 10 days at the hotel! Staff was great. Alex De La Serra is beyond the best hotel manager that we ever met. He make us feel welcome from the beginning and was always so helpful and available for us. It was a blessing to have him around and he was probably one of the main reason of our extended stay!! Our room was clean and the bed really comfy. We couldn't asked for a better mattress, it was like sleeping on a cloud! We recommend this hotel for sure!
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review to read!  We are ecstatic that you enjoyed your stay so much, and thrilled that the service exceeded your expectations.  We hope this means you will come back and see us again soon!  Have a great day!

Summary: I stayed at the Hotel Fullerton for one night, the warm-hearted staff, Alex, is so helpful.He gave my family a good view room and  helped I to open the sofa bed, and gave me some toothpastes and shavers, he made our stay very easy. I will come back to stay this hotel again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your kind words for Alex - I will be sure to pass along your regards.  Please come and see us again soon.  Be well!

Summary: The staff was very helpful and made our stay very easy. We originally planned to stay for two nights but extended our trip for another night. It did not take long and the staff helped us book the same room. The room and pool area were very clean. Also, the shuttle driver, Joe L, went above and beyond and helped my boyfriend and I with some car troubles. We will definitely go back!
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. It's wonderful hearing you say that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team, especially Joe - I will be sure to share your compliments with all. Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the hotel very soon. Thank you and be well.

Summary: I stayed at the Hotel Fullerton for 3 nights, two in a way since I arrived at almost midnight. The staff was awesome and treated me like royalty. The night manager, Alex de la Serna was the best manager I have ever encountered. He knew my name after the first meeting, and subsequently made everything perfect. Beside Alex the entirety of the staff were pleasant, helpful, courteous, and just all around super. If management reads these reviews, give Alex a raise, he is amazing and you are lucky to have him. If I ever have to come back to this area of California I wouldn't hesitate to pick the Hotel Fullerton again. Kudos to y'all.  Sean
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words and review! We are so pleased you thoroughly enjoyed your recent getaway, and ecstatic that you chose The Hotel Fullerton for it! Please visit us again soon!

Summary: The hotel dining is wonderful. Can't say enough good things about the staff. They were warm, grateful and very energetic. Kudos to Alex on night shift. Very accommodating. Room was very nice and clean. Wifi was super fast on the top floor.
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. It's wonderful hearing you say that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team, especially Alex - I will be sure to share your compliments with all. Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the hotel very soon. Thank you and be well.

Summary: Stayed here with family while in town for a wedding. Very good value for the money. Breakfast was tasty each morning, the pool area most enjoyable, and ALEX could not have been more helpful. Truly, you could not have a more impressive  ambassador of good will  for your guests. Hope you pay him well......he's your biggest asset and would fit in seamlessly at five star property!
Manager Response: I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast and the pool during your recent stay.  I'm sure you won't be surprised to hear that we aren't surprised by Alex's tremendous contribution to the hotel, as evidenced by the numerous reviews of recognition he has received.  We are ecstatic to hear that he was able to make your trip an enjoyable one!  Thank you for staying with us, and come back soon!  Be well!

Summary: The hotel was amazing, it is near Disney land and Disney downtown for shopping and having fun. It is however a little bit far from hollywood and other attractions in LA. But, Mr Alex, the manager, was friendly and always helpful and ready to help in any possible way.  The rooms were clean and ready for checking in the moment we arrived.  I haven't tried the food there because I was fasting but I tried some stuff and it tasted really fresh all the time.  There is a printing center that you can use anytime and the gym is 24 hours operating.   My overall experience was quite good and i totally recommend this hotel for people willing to stay in Anaheim
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words about our hotel, and a special thanks for recognizing Alex!  We are so incredibly grateful that you chose to share your experience with the entire Tripadvisor community.  We hope that when your travels bring you back to the area, that you visit us again soon.  Be well!

Summary: My family and I spent a week at this hotel and have to say we were really impressed. The room was quite big and spotless. We only used the pool area one afternoon but it was really nice, private and quiet. The breakfast is included and is really good a great selection. We ate in the restaurant just once but the food was lovely. The bar area is nice and there is a garden to sit in too. The hotel offers regular shuttles in to Disney throughout the day and the evening. We used the shuttle quite a bit and especially in the evening to go out for dinner-it was always on time.  The staff are all really lovely and so helpful, especially Alex the night manager and the lovely bar staff. I would definitely recommend this hotel and would use it again if we ever return to the area. Excellent
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. It's wonderful hearing you say that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team, especially Alex - I will be sure to share your compliments with all. Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the hotel very soon. Thank you and be well.

Summary: Free cocktails on arrival.  Friendly staff at front desk.  Free water and towels in workout room.  Beds comfy.  Hotel Quiet.  Pleasantly surprised  Would stay here again!  Great location by 91 freeway  Parking free.  Undiscovered jewel.  Uber will take you to great bars in area
Manager Response: Wow!  What a great review to read!  I'm so happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  We are ecstatic to be able to offer all the great perks you mentioned.  I hope if your future travels bring you to the area again that you do come visit us.  Be well!

Summary: Beyond surprised to get the best pairing of chocolate and Hudson Valley Foie Gras at my Hotel in Fullerton CA!   The Chef Zach and server Alyssa made this shot-in-the-dark hotel choice one of the best I've made in my sales travels in the past few years!   I will be staying here going forward on all my travels to Fullerton, Anaheim,  Brea!  Sorry Marriott Rewards, I'll get points at other properties away from the OC!  #ATKTBYZACH #citizenkitchenoc
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We are pleased that you had a great time with us, and ecstatic to hear about your rave review of Citizen Kitchen! Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: Nice hotel. We used this as a base to explore the Los Angeles area and it was in a convenient location. Close to the Disney parks and Knott's berry farm. About a half hour drive to the beaches. About an hour to universal/Warner Bros and Hollywood. We had breakfast included in our price and as far as hotel breakfasts go it didn't disappoint. Good selection of hot and cold food and you can order eggs the way you want them. Clean rooms friendly staff and a not bad pool. I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review of your recent stay at The Hotel Fullerton. It means so much not only to me, but to the entire team here at the Hotel, that you would share your recommendation of our property with the TripAdvisor community. I am delighted that we had the opportunity to welcome you at our hotel recently, and hope that we will have the pleasure of doing so again soon.

Summary: The visit to this hotel was great and the staff were very friendly and gave great advice for us visiting Disney. It was nice to bus it in from the hotel and return later in the evening and relax around the pool. We also enjoyed going to the local college 4th of july celebrations
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words and review! We are so pleased you thoroughly enjoyed your recent getaway, and ecstatic that you chose The Hotel Fullerton for it! Please visit us again soon!

Summary: The hotel was conveniently located next to the highway. Great shuttle service to Disney. One of the most friendliest hotel staffs I have encountered. They were always available to answer questions and seemed generally interested in making our stay nice. Room was spacious and clean. Kids enjoyed the pool and breakfast in Red was very nice.
Manager Response: That you for the kind words about the hotel and our restaurant! We take great pride in our entire service team and product, and we will make sure your kind words are shared with the hotel service team. Visit us again soon! Be well.

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel, staff are so friendly especially Alex, he was excellent on customer service. Good job to the front liner also. my family and I stayed on this hotel for more than 3 days and it was a great experience because of great staff.  Alex was excellent on his job and also Britanny too.  Thank you guys.  DE LEON's Family
Manager Response: What a great review! We are thrilled that our staff, especially our superstars Alex and Brittney, were able to take care of you! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: I highly recommend the Hotel. Nice people. Great food. The rooms are clean and quiet. We travel a lot do to work and we love this place. All details about the hotel are perfect. Ideal locations for going to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review of your recent stay at The Hotel Fullerton. It means so much not only to me, but to the entire team here at the Hotel, that you would share your recommendation of our property with the TripAdvisor community. I am delighted that we had the opportunity to welcome you at our hotel recently, and hope that we will have the pleasure of doing so again soon.

Summary Heading: Great service. Friendly staff. Would recommend!
Summary: The hotel is really big and the rooms are amazingly furnished. All possible needs are catered for. Has everything a hotel should have and more! Room service is on point. Alex is wonderful, and is super helpful and fun to talk to. Great atmosphere. Would definitely recommend to anyone, especially if going to Disneyland. One of the best hotels I have stayed at! Will definitely come again.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review of your recent stay at The Hotel Fullerton. It means so much not only to me, but to the entire team here at the Hotel, that you would share your recommendation of our property with the TripAdvisor community. I am delighted that we had the opportunity to welcome you at our hotel recently, and hope that we will have the pleasure of doing so again soon.

Summary: Very clean and nice hotel. Arrived late, new to the area. Asking for directions and recommendations, the staff are very nice, provided us a lot of useful information, especially Alex. Thanks for the help. We will come back soon again for sure.
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. It's wonderful hearing you say that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team, especially Alex - I will be sure to share your compliments with all. Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the hotel very soon. Thank you and be well.

Summary: I found this place online for a quick Disney trip. It presented very nicely. New sign. Clean lobby. Clean grounds. Clean bed. Very courteous front desk. Check in was a breeze and there was plenty of parking but you may have a bit of a walk to your room. Our room had a mini fridge and coffee maker. The room was very nice BUT the bathroom was very small. Too small for more than one person In there at a time. Very well lit and when the curtains were drawn very dark. It was great. Even though it is right next to the freeway I did not hear it once. It is designed so all the rooms face a central courtyard away from the freeway. It came with a free breakfast buffet and it was delicious. Eggs. Bacon. Toast. Bagels. Little cereals. Oatmeal. Fruit. Juice. Coffee. Hash browns. It was very
Manager Response: I'm so happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us!  It sounds like you especially enjoyed our buffet breakfast.  I am sorry to hear that you found our fitness center to be less than stellar.  We are always making improvement to our property, and we will certainly take your comments under advisement.  Thank you and be well!

Summary: the hotel is quite large and he rooms are huge...the bathrooms are nice and clean. The pool is enormous and there is a small garden in the hotel itself which is very very pretty.. The staff is very humble and the GM of he hotel i.e. Mr.Alex has been of great help.
Manager Response: What a great review! We are thrilled that our staff, especially our superstar Alex, were able to take care of you! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: We got a great deal on this hotel but being unfamiliar with the area we weren't sure where it was.  Its's right next to the freeway...our room is in the tower at the back where I was told you couldn't hear it. I'm not a great sleeper and believe me you can (which is why I'm writing this review at 5 am!)  Rooms are nice and big and service is good...but nothing around the hotel in terms of other bars or restaurants. A good place to stay to explore surrouning areas but there are cheaper hotels away from the freeway where you can do that yoo
Manager Response: I'm happy to hear that you got a good deal on your accommodations but sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the location of the hotel.  We are conveniently close to many local attractions such as Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm, outlet shopping at the Block at Orange, and fine restaurants in the area in downtown Fullerton and the Garden Walk in Anaheim.  Hopefully next time you choose to visit you are able to take advantage of these locations!  Thank you for staying with us.  Be well.

Summary: Nice room, well-appointed with HBO, etc.  Also nice exercise room (two ellipticals, two treadmills, a small nautilus machine and some light hand weights). Hot tub and pool also nice. Despite quasi-industrial location (and quite close to busy freeway), comfortable, decent place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words about our exercise room, jacuzzi and pool.  We hope your future travels to the area will bring you back to our hotel.  Thank you and be well.

Summary Heading: Lovely affordable stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at the Fullerton for one night, and had a wonderful visit. The rooms were clean, the pool was nice and large, and the decor was generally quite nice. Staff members where eager to help us when we first arrived, including Alex who went out of his way to make us feel at home after a long journey. The rooms lacked a microwave, and Ethernet connection though these were not major problems during our stay. Overall a very nice visit to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review of your recent stay at The Hotel Fullerton. It means so much not only to me, but to the entire team here at the Hotel, that you would share your recommendation of our property with the TripAdvisor community. I am delighted that we had the opportunity to welcome you at our hotel recently, and hope that we will have the pleasure of doing so again soon.

Summary: From the moment we stepped out of our taxi, we were greeted by Alex who could not have been more helpful with settling us into the hotel/room. Alex also made our stay at your hotel so relaxing and enjoyable. He made us feel special and looked after us until the second we departed. The buffet breakfast with the omelet's to order was a great addition and coffee that was drinkable (bravo). Michelle in the restaurant was more then charming who remembered our favourite drinks each night and always had a friendly disposition.  Absolutely enjoyable, would certainly return and will be recommending to others.
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. It's wonderful hearing you say that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team, especially Alex - I will be sure to share your compliments with all. Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the hotel very soon. Thank you and be well.

Summary: I was with a large group staying at the hotel for a meditation retreat and was blown away by the customer service provided by Alex and the other hotel staff. They paid close attention to our needs and preferences and consistently went the extra mile to make our stay enjoyable and memorable. We will definitely be coming back every year!
Manager Response: What a great review! We are thrilled that our staff, especially our superstar Alex, were able to take care of you!  We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary Heading: Great 3-night stay at The Hotel Fullerton!
Summary: Our room, conveniently located right by the pool, was clean and very presentable. The bedding was clean and even nice looking. I wished there had been a luggage rack, but even without one, there was enough room by the closet and the mirror to store our things.  We enjoyed a hearty breakfast in the Red Restaurant each morning and found it to be a great start to our day.  The pool area was clean and very accommodating for our large group of adults with a few children.  All in all, a good experience.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Wow!  What a great review to read!  We're ecstatic that you found everything to your satisfaction.  If your travels bring you to the immediate area again soon, we do hope you will choose us again!  Thank you and be well!

Summary: The inclusive breakfast with omelets to order was great and staff was kind and accommodating. My husband was there visiting family, the hotel was conveniently situated off the freeway. The exterior could use a facelift. I booked this room for my husband and he said I would have been comfortable and I have high standards for hotel rooms.
Manager Response: I'm so happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast and found the service to be accommodating!  We take great pride in being able to offer these things to our guests and I am glad you're husband was satisfied with his stay.  We do hope you will come and visit us (again!) soon.  Be well!

Summary Heading: Wonderful warm friendly hotel with a great pool and outdoor hot tub
Summary: The staff are so friendly and always rememeber me when I come back over a year later. Especially Mr Alex Dela Serna the night manager. The drivers a super riendly and accomodating. They are all lovely and always willing to go that extra mile to give you great service! the rooms were clean and spacious, the pool was so clean and I saw it being cleaned every day, the cleaning staff smile at you as they walk around the building. I would always stay here on any trip its really a wonderful hotel with some truly great staff, it is situated a 5 minute car ride to disney land and I took a trip to Newport beach in under an hour so close by to many attractions. Go and enjoy!
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review of your recent stay at The Hotel Fullerton.  It means so much not only to me, but to the entire team here at the Hotel, that you would share your recommendation of our property with the TripAdvisor community. I am delighted that we had the opportunity to welcome you at our hotel recently, and hope that we will have the pleasure of doing so again soon.

Summary Heading: The staff are hateful and mean spirited and it's a party hotel that's NOT in Anaheim!
Summary: 1st: it's NOT in Anaheim. 2nd: the Wi-Fi is crap! 3rd: the front desk are rude and told me to "go have a seat" while they find my reservation, that I made three hours prior and that they could not find now. 4th there was weed smoke in the hallways and parties going on all night long. 5th: the neighborhood is pure ghetto. 6th: I caught this creepy dude peeping tom looking into my window, (1st floor room) and when I jerked opened the curtain he jumped and ran. Police were called. $100 room deposit.
Manager Response: I'm very sorry to hear about all of the problems you experienced at the hotel. What you have described is not representative of the service and product we are proud to provide to each and every one of our guests. Thank you and be well.

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights. Our rooms were nice and clean facing the pool away from the main road. Hotel is located conveniently to Hollywood and Disneyland. The staff were helpful and warm to tourist. Would have given 5 stars rating if there were more and better of food for breakfast.
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. I am so glad that you had such an enjoyable stay with us at The Hotel Fullerton. It's wonderful hearing you say you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team - I will be sure to share your compliments with all.  Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the Hotel very soon.

Summary: This hotel and conference center, plunked down in the middle of busy, busy, Anaheim, does a brisk business in conferences and in tours. There's an hourly shuttle to Disneyland! Given how busy this place is, it's amazing how efficient their staff is. They are always moving! They are always helpful! They are always smiling! And they do a very creditable job of providing a breakfast buffet and very nice conference meals. A job very well done.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words!  We take great pride in being able to offer exceptional accommodations along with an excellent staff!  I will be sure to share your comments with our entire team.  Please do visit us again soon.  Be well!

Summary Heading: Very good hotel, clean and close to good places with very accomodating staff.
Summary: Went to this hotel for some vacation and business trip. Hotel was very nice, very accomodating staff especially Mr Alex Dela Serna who made us feel very welcome and assisted us. Place was just a few minutes away from disneyland, also easy to go from and to places we needed to go. Place is quiet and safe. Room is clean and very relaxing. Will definitely go back whenever i'm visiting Los Angeles.
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. It's wonderful hearing you say that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team, especially Alex - I will be sure to share your compliments with all. Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the hotel very soon. Thank you and be well.

Summary Heading: its a good hotel with nice staff
Summary: such a nice hotel, it takes only 15 minutes to Disneyland , and they have a shuttle to Disneyland with a skillfull driver, so dont need to worry about that. and the staff really helpful. this hotel is very good.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words, especially about our complimentary Disneyland shuttle!  We are happy to be able to offer this service to our guests.  Please come visit us again soon.  Be well!

Summary Heading: NICE, BUT TOO COSTLY FOR THE PRODUCT
Summary: Was curious about this. I believe at one point it was an Embassy Suites. Chose here, very nice lobby and intigrated restaurant/bar. Did not eat the food here. The room was very nice, in the "tower" it ooverlooked an industrial/truck logistics facoility. But was quiet at night. The bed was ULTRA plush!  it was a tempeura-pedic mattress.  and the room was nicely furnished. I was very satisfied.  however; One night was $171. I elected to stay over one more night, it was $181.  A bit over priced, I think. The hallway  smelled stale; like a wet dog!  it had an unfresh smell.  No minibar in room, or other inroom amenities, except a one cup at a time coffee maker. NO in room menu. although they offfer room service.  Nice place; but way too expensive,
Manager Response: I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us, but were a little disappointed with the room rate.  We strive to stay competitive with the other hotels in the area, and are happy to be able to provide the stellar service and accommodation that you experienced with us.  We do hope that you will choose our hotel in the future.  Thank you and be well.

Summary Heading: AMAZING!!!! I WANT TO GO BACK
Summary: Beautiful hotel, we stayed there on our trip to disneyland last year for my birthday, and we are planning on staying there this year as well! Amazing place rooms are really clean, and comfortable, as well the breakfast area it's delicious plus its free!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  I am ecstatic that you chose our hotel for your birthday fun!  We know there are a lot of options in the area, and we do appreciate that you stayed with us in the past and plan to in the future.  We hope to exceed your expectations soon!  Be well.

Summary: Just over the Anaheim border, in Fullerton. Close enough to all the fun in Anaheim and Buena Park. I was there with 55 high school students and 10 chaperones for a choral festival and, of course, Disneyland. Tucked away just off the freeway, it's surprisingly quiet. About a mile away from restaurants, but it worked out great. There is a lovely courtyard and pool in the center of the building. Also, there is a workout facility and a couple of restaurants (though I used none of these) On the day after arrival, the kids were able to commandeer the pool. The staff was great; check-in and check-out, even for the huge group, was awesome. Lots of parking in the back for shuttling on and off the buses. Rooms were clean and suited our purposes beautifully. Overall, a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for the kind words regarding our hotel!  I am happy to hear that we were able to accommodate the large group you were with.  We hope that you will choose us again soon!  Thank you and be well!

Summary Heading: Dirty room, very loud at night, cockroaches
Summary: We recently stayed here and were extremely disappointed with our stay. Many of the fixtures in the room were broken or falling apart such as the shower and lamp. The bedding smelt terrible on both beds. We took it all off for the housekeepers to change but the next set of bedding smelt just as bad- a very stale and dusty unpleasant smell. We found a huge cockroach in the bathroom one night which made us feel uncomfortable for the duration of our stay, worried about were any more going to appear or crawl on us or our belongings. Our room overlooked the area by the pool and each night there was a congregation of people there til the early hours of the morning. One night in particular was ridiculously loud. People were running up and down the corridors and there were a lot of
Manager Response: I'm very sorry to hear about all of the problems you experienced at the hotel.  What you have described is not representative of the service and product we are proud to provide to each and every one of our guests.  If you would like to discuss the issues further, please email brett.smissen@hfullerton.com and hopefully we can better assist you regarding this matter going forward.  Thank you and be well.

Summary: The check-in was quick and easy. The room was spacious, and clean. The Staff were attentive, accommodating, and very professional!  Alex at the Front Desk was superb!  Rolando, bell hop was a huge help especially that the elevator in my building was out of order at that time.  All hotel front desk staff should carry the attitude of these two which truly represents customer service at the forefront. Thank you guys! You made my stay very pleasant.
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. It's wonderful hearing you say that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team, especially Alex and Rolando - I will be sure to share your compliments with all. Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the Hotel very soon. Thank you and be well.

Summary: I have stayed here many a night on business, but during the past week, the apartment occupied by my girlfriend and I locally was flooded; and we needed a place to stay for about a week. The Hotel Fullerton has taken full care of us during this time. The hotel manager, Alex has gone out of his way to make sure we had the best service possible. The hotel is very close to both downtown Fullerton, and Downtown Anaheim; as well as Disneyland. There's plenty of things to do in close proximity to the hotel. Rates are very reasonable, and the service staff is friendly and accommodating. The Hotel Fullerton is highly recommended by us!
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. I am so glad that we were able to accommodate you when your apartment was flooded. It's wonderful hearing you say that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team, especially Alex - I will be sure to share your compliments with all. Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the Hotel very soon.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel with a 16 member student group. The staff were so supportive in helping us find spaces to meet, work and have lunch. I felt safe and the rooms were clean throughout the stay.  Another account of support for manager Alex and the Maintenance team. My group received trophies that were too large to pack in our suitcases. Not only did the Maintenance team take them apart and wrap the pieces but Alex found a bag and gave us advice for going to the airport with the disassembled trophy. Quick thinking and first rate service!  This was a good place to have high school student groups. The staff, in general, were patient and kind with my students. They loved hanging out at the pool and the gazebo areas. It was close enough and far enough from many attractions,
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words regarding our hotel and our team members.  And a special thank you for singling out our maintenance team and Alex.  We will make sure to share your regards with the entire team.  Please visit us again soon!  Be well.

Summary: The best hotel we have stayed at ever, and we have been to many. Immediately upon check-in Alex recommend spots for us to go to and arranged for a rental car as well, we are from Toronto and did not know anything about the city.  We were here for a week and every staff member, whether it be the front desk, maids, room service or bartenders were all very welcoming.  We recommend his to anyone. :)
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. I am so glad that you had such an enjoyable stay with us at The Hotel Fullerton. It's wonderful hearing you say that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team, especially Alex - I will be sure to share your compliments with all.  Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the Hotel very soon.

Summary: Used the hotel with a group of 40 students. One day, they were able to bring my students to Disneyland, but not back to the hotel in the evening. The desk manager who I booked the shuttle with didn't offer any solutions to getting my students back to the hotel, but when I went back to the front desk the next day to ask again how to solve this problem, a front desk manager named Alex solved it smoothly. Alex seemed genuinely concerned with our group having a pleasant stay and worked to remember my name. The restaurant staff were very polite and efficient and at all hours there were staff around the hotel making sure everything was secure and clean.
Manager Response: What a great review to read. We will make sure to recognize our staff member that went above and beyond to make your stay the best. Do visit us again soon so that we may continue our tradition of providing stellar service. Thank and safe travels.

Summary: I had a great stay at the Hotel Fullerton. I was just in town for the weekend but it did the job. Clean and modern rooms, with very comfortable beds. We needed a few toiletries and they brought those to us very quickly. The have a great swimming pool also! I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: We would like to thank Alex the manager for his kindness and sweet treament. The hotel has a great services.the room was beautiful has a great view. I would recommend any one to stay in this beautiful hotel.
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. I am so glad that you had such an enjoyable stay with us at The Hotel Fullerton. It's wonderful hearing you say that you found the hotel to be "beautifulc", but even more so that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team, especially Alex - I will be sure to share your compliments with him!  Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the Hotel very soon.

Summary Heading: Very disappointing...pictures do not match the actual property!
Summary: My room was not clean, scum accumulation in sink and bathtub.  Could not get the shower to turn on and  stay on. Surfaces were sticky. Elevator was broken. The worst was the noise from other guests all night. Looks old, tired and in need of better management. Over priced. We dreaded going back to hotel so we stayed out late until time to sleep. Will never stay again. even if it was for free.
Manager Response: Dear Teri M,  We thank you for your feedback!  We take pride with the product we offer to our guests.  All the pictures of our hotel are the all recent and uploaded by us and are the uniform everywhere online.  We do apologize that our hotel did not meet your reference.  Again, thank you for taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Summary: Hotel clean off the freeway they will accommodate to your needs close to attractions food is very good very pleasant  stay  nice pool area very clean an friendly  place they took are luggage to are room free breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We appreciate the kind words regarding the accommodations and services you received.  Do visit us again soon.  Be well!

Summary Heading: Awesome Hotel close to it all
Summary: We stayed here 4 nights for my husband's work. We came here from Wisconsin. We were recommended to stay here by Ducati North America. This place is a gem of a hotel. We were greeted by the night manager Alex on our first night, he was so kind to us when we arrived. We arrived 3 hours later than expected after flight delays and were very tired travelers. He treated us like royalty for our entire stay! Hotel is 4 miles from Disneyland, 30 miles from LA, and 20 miles from Huntington Beach. Will stay here again in a heartbeat!  Clean, comfy, newly remodeled. A hidden gem. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words regarding your experience at The Hotel Fullerton, especially regarding our night manager Alex!  We are pleased that you would consider returning to stay with us again!  Be well!

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for a weekend. We were greeted by Rene at the front desk. He was very professional checking us in. The rooms are better then we expected and, breakfast was a great start to our days during our stay. We did not have time to enjoy the pool but, it did look very charming. I highly recommend The Hotel Fullerton Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review of your recent stay at The Hotel Fullerton.  It means so much not only to me, but to the entire team here at the Hotel, that you would share your recommendation of our property with the TripAdvisor community. I am delighted that we had the opportunity to welcome you at our hotel recently, and hope that we will have the pleasure of doing so again soon.

Summary: This is a wonderful hotel to stay. It's right off the freeway and close to places to see and do. Staff is helpful with a concern on how your accomdations are.  Tried the rib-eye steak at the hotel restaurant and it gives steak houses a run for there business.
Manager Response: That you for the kind words about the hotel and our restaurant!  We take great pride in our entire service team and product, and we will make sure your kind words are shared with the hotel service team.  Visit us again soon!  Be well.

Summary: I am impressed, I must say. Hotel Fullerton gets 5 stars. The management is run more efficiently than others; I stay in hotels 200 nights out of the year  on business so My perspective is valid. Less waste with the basics and more luxury with the important stuff. From the sensible refillable bathroom amenities and magnet privacy signs and keyless entry to the fine dining experience and valet service, comfortable soundproof stone walls and private balconies, they are a first choice for a great location and a great rate for great quality. Friendly staff professional maintenance, my only wish is That I might have found this place sooner for my weekly Disneyland business visits, and I wish The Chef of the restaurant didn't need sleep because it's too good to ever be closed!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We are pleased that you had a great time with us! Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: The hotel was first class, breakfasts and Red restaurant dining room staff were excellent with many choices (except waffles). TV and WiFi  worked. Ample bathroom with good water pressure and soap, shampoo, and conditioner dispensers on wall. Good sized towels . The hotel is tour stop for mainland Chinese tourists and these adults kids on tours were swimming in terrible cold, windy weather so the pool must be heated. Also looked like a heated Jacuzzi pool with outdoor shower. Well landscaped grounds. A bad extension cord problem with a floor lamp was fixed immediately upon my request. Computers and printer for SW boarding passes.  An unusual (to me) key system worked perfectly. Free newspapers at front desk. In reading other reviews, I would not call the breakfasts "simple"
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We are pleased that you had a great time with us! Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: This is a beautiful full-service hotel.  The rooms are clean and modern.  The lobby and common areas are very nicely decorated.  The bed is comfortable but the four pillows on my king size bed were all very hard.  My room was near the end of the hotel, so wifi reception was poor at the desk in the room--I had to move to the table holding the tv in order to get connected.  The best reception was near the door.  The room was exceptionally clean.  There is a small fridge nicely hidden behind a cupboard door under the tv.
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: This hotel is located next to a freeway, convenient to Disneyland, Knotts Berry Farm, beaches, and other tourist destinations. It is surrounded by commercial and industrial properties.  It has been beautifully remodeled.  Rooms are gorgeous and the outdoor courtyard with pool is very nice.  A nice buffet breakfast, including omelet bar, is free during the week. The a/c in the room works very well, but I found it a bit noisy.  I enjoyed my 5-day stay and appreciated it's convenient location.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am sorry to hear that you experienced an issue with a noisy A/C during your recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed the other aspects of our hotel, and we hope you will visit us again soon!  Be well.

Summary Heading: I hope the stay is better than the customer service!
Summary: Just made a reservation on TravelAdvisor.com and mistakenly made it for three nights instead of 2.  I immediately called the hotel and they said "TOUGH LUCK"...I will have to pay for the three nights (already charged to my AMEX) when I am only staying two nights.  I can understand non-refundable with airline, but a hotel?  That's nuts.  DON'T STAY HERE.
Manager Response: We're sorry for the issue that you were faced with when booking and realizing that an error was made with the dates of your reservation. Our Director of Sales attempted to reach out to you yesterday to discuss the situation further but she has not heard back as of yet. We hope to hear from you soon, so that we may resolve and update your reservation in accordance to your plans. We look forward to your visit in March and hope to gain the remainder of the stars on your review!

Summary: It has been pleasant 3 days staying at this hotel. Staff from front desk, restaurants and shuttle drivers are all extremely accommodating, always willing to go extra miles to assist us.  We didn't have a car during our stay. The hotel provides free shuttle service to take us around the area.   The hotel manager Alex is lovely. He made sure we are well looked after.   Breakfast was simple but fresh and tasty, gave us a good start before theme parking. Room was clean and housekeeping was done properly everyday.   We would love to come back again in future.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us, and even more pleased that Alex was able to assist you!  Please do visit us again soon!  Be well.

Summary: it is my second time staying in this lovely hotel in room #310. Thanks Alex for your kindly help on attending to our needs and made our stay very comfortable and at home. Hotel staff are all nice with smile all the time,ready to assistance. room is clean and neat. The hotel setup/decor is very beautiful and relaxing. love the beds and pillows. The food is the best i have tasted during the trip in the U.S Definitely  will come back
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: We booked 6 rooms for a group birthday dinner nearby.  The sales manager, Dan, was very helpful and got us a good rate.  Everyone loved the beautiful property and rooms and the bar area where we congregated afterwards.  A shuttle was arranged to transport all of us to and from the restaurant.  Our driver, Andy, was friendly and great.  We definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary Heading: Great for a trip to Disneyland
Summary: Very spacious rooms with nice and comfy beds. Got a great price deal for this hotel and was a bit nervous but it actually exceeded my expectations.  One room with two double beds was more than enough for me, my wife, my 5yo daughter and my 3yo son.  We were originally thinking on taking the shuttle to the parks but it turns out that it's only one per hour and you have to book it in advance in high seasons, same with the return trip so we decided to drive. It was the best decision as it's less than 10min away and you are the sole owner of your time.  In terms of food we only had dinner one day and it as just OK. Parking and all other services were pretty good including front desk service.  Would definitely stay there again in the near future.
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: Beautiful hotel with great amenities! Food service is delicious & very accommodating! Love that this hotel has a shuttle service, that can take you around in a 5 mile radius..such as to downtown fullerton (super cute area..lots of great restaurants/bars/shops) that is complimentary! Night driver Andy, is great..he really drove me around quite a bit..being that I was in town from out of state & was unfamiliar with the area!
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: I had been to California before (was born there), and wanted to take my family. Our travel agency gave us some options, and after careful thought, I decided for this hotel, and I´m really happy with the decision. I would rate the hotel, first based on the kind people that serve there in the front desk and in the restaurant. We stayed there for 6 nights, so each morning we had breakfast there and the waiters were very nice people who have worked there for many years, and they seemed happy. The night manager Alex, treat us very kindly, gave us plenty of tips and information to enjoy our stay. Even the shuttle driver to Disney was really friendly. Now, the room is clean, and beds are comfortable. I had mentioned that they have a shuttle that takes you to Disney, and they were
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels I've stayed at
Summary: This place was great. The rooms are very quiet in the sense that you can't hear your neighbors through the walls. Decor is very nice. Nice Jacuzzi, right on the 91 freeway too. It's slightly out of my price range for regular visits, which is unfortunate for me.   The two things that stand out the most are:  1. The Showers. Best I've seen in a hotel, and I've been to a lot.  2. The breakfast. Fairly standard hotel hot breakfast buffet, but it was better than ones other hotels have charged me $12 for.   I guess if I had to find a negative I'd say that the heater system seemed to have a mind of its own. But it still did it's job, just had to fuss with it a bit.   They also don't milk you for cash like other hotels. Wi fi? Free. Movies? Free (unless still in theaters, and they do
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: My family and I, had a great stay at the Fullerton. All the staff including front desk (Alex the night manager was great, is an excellent doing what he does), people who was serving the breakfast buffet, the driver....every body were friendly and gave  us such as great service. Clean and comfortable rooms. The breakfast  buffet was good...excellent Colombian coffee(for us it is important  cause we are from Costa Rica and here we have good cofe) My kids 11 and 8 years old were very happy. We hope we will be there soon...maybe for this 2016 hollidays with more of our family!!@
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: Reasonable for greater Disney Resort area.  A little farther out, but shuttle us available. Rooms pretty ordinary.  Showers in tubs, very small bathroom, single sink. Clearly skimped on toiletries.  Small pillows, and double beds rather than queens, made sleeping a little uncomfortable.   Service was pretty friendly and helpful, including shuttle drivers.  Breakfast buffet was an odd experience with a very limited amount of food options, overall could use improvement. Plenty of parking and easy access from SH 91.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. Although you satisfactorily enjoyed your stay we are disheartened to know that we did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to bring up your comments to the proper departments so that they may be able to resolve any issues that may hinder the enjoyment of our guests. Summary: Stayed at room 251. The staff are extremely courteous, especially Alex who is very accommodating to our requests. You can ask them to book for you a shuttle that will drive you to Disneyland. Walmart is nearby, and you can also ask them for a shuttle service to that place. I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. I am so glad that you had such an enjoyable stay with us at The Hotel Fullerton. It's wonderful hearing you say that you found the hotel to be "fantastic", but even more so that you were so impressed with the service you received from our hotel team, in particular Alex! I will be sure to share your compliments with all. Again, thank you for sharing your review with us and the TripAdvisor community. I do hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the Hotel very soon.

Summary Heading: Superb Hotel service with low price
Summary: At first day arrival I've already impressed with front desk hospitality and the manager himself, Mr.Alex brought my luggages to my room. The room was right next to the lobby. It was clean and has 2 big queen size beds. Later on the night, I book a hotel shuttle to take me nearby dining places, since no restaurant within walking distance. Mr.Andy, the chaffeur recommended me some restaurants  and asked what time he mist pick us up. He also offered us if we wanted to stop and buy something from the minimarket on the way home.  ROOM- very good USD 20 for 2 wifi connections for entire stay. Unlimited drinks cold and hot water in vending machine room. Great disney shuttle & on-time drop and pick up.

Summary: Stayed here at the beginning of November with my partner for 3 nights. We booked the hotel as we were planning a Disneyland visit one day and the other day we planned to explore some other parts of LA by car.  The room we had was large, clean and comfortable. From other reviews I am guessing we stayed in one of the renovated rooms  We ate in the hotel restaurant on our first night, the service was excellent and the food was good. As the hotel is beside an industrial estate there isn't that much near by however, as we had rented a car the hotel provided an excellent base for travelling around as it was so close to the freeway/interstate. The staff at the hotel were really helpful and friendly, the only thing that could have been improved on was the breakfast however this wasn't
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review of your recent stay at The Hotel Fullerton.  It means so much not only to me, but to the entire team here at the Hotel, that you would share your recommendation of our property with the TripAdvisor community. I am delighted that we had the opportunity to welcome you at our hotel recently, and hope that we will have the pleasure of doing so again soon.

Summary: Really enjoyed our stay here... Nice clean hotel... The restraunt was very good.... They also have a separate bar area. Really nice pool and courtyard area..plus they have smoking rooms... Definatley stay here again
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: We were really impressed by the quality and standard of the Fullerton Hotel. The staff were friendly helpful and professional and the rooms were very nice...clean and spacious. Great food - we tried both restaurants. Highy recommended.

Summary Heading: Convenient, Clean, Comfortable and a Great Staff
Summary: I stayed at the hotel for 4 nights on a business trip. Very convenient to 91, 57 and 5 for meetings in Orange County.  My room was very clean.  The bed was very comfortable.  The staff at the front desk and the bar/restaurant were super. The very large pool was great for swimming laps.

Summary: Not my best experience by far.  Room smelled like mildew or old urine...cleaning ac filters helped a little.  Never could acquire good Internet signal, as a result lost three evenings of planned webinar attendance. Staff made effort to correct items, but no success with above.  They did add 5 hangers to the shower curtain that were missing (initially resulted in water getting all over the bathroom floor as it couldn't be contained).
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for what you experienced here in our hotel. What you have mentioned is not a clear representation of our standards and expectations. We strive very hard to have you leave us feeling even better than when you arrived. And in this case we did not meet that goal. I do hope that when your future travels bring you to the area, you will give as an opportunity to make it right for you.  Be well.

Summary Heading: GOOD PLACE TO STAY IN FOR VACATION
Summary: Good place to stay in very welcoming staffs good service,presentable,nice and clean hotel.They also have restaurants inside. I'm surely coming back in this place again. Also, I recommend this hotel to my family,friends and to everyone. Very great this hotel is awesome very professional staffs we're so happy.

Summary: I have stayed here for about four weeks due to work. The staff here are helpful and polite. Alex the office manager is very welcoming and always greet us with the biggest smile.  The hotel provides free shuttle service to anywhere nearby and Disneyland, all you need to do is arrange the schedule with the driver in advance.  However, breakfast is normal, hope there will be more variety added to the selection. Although the room although not top notch it is comfortable. And also, gym needs maintenance as most of the equipments are on the brink of breaking down.  Overall, the stay is wonderful due as the staff is very helpful and welcoming. I would stay here again the next time when I travel to Fullerton. And one more thing, you can see Disneyland's firework from the hotel!

Summary Heading: Great Place, Only A Few Needs
Summary: Beautiful hotel. The staff here is top notch. Room was clean and very comfortable. The decor is nice. A few complaints. No microwave in the room. No free breakfast. Those are industry standards and they need ti catch up. Also, the carpet in the halls needed to be replaced,
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. Although you satisfactorily enjoyed your stay we are disheartened to know that we did not meet your expectations. Summary: Great service, excellent staff! We were here for 2 days, the staff really made the place very welcoming and warm. The rooms are nice and have fridges in them, didn't see a microwave in our room and rest of the normal amenities were there.    They have a shuttle service that runs back and forth to Disney and complimentary, you have let them know an hour ahead to be dropped off & picked up, the drivers were great - buddy & another gentleman in the evening, both very informative & helpful.  The reason I gave this a 4 star - our room wasn't vacuumed, not at all - there were hair curled up on the floor and crumbs over the carpet. Beds were clean, bathrooms were clean - we were tired from a long drive so didn't bother them with it, also having managed a property before I know they
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. Although you satisfactorily enjoyed your stay we are disheartened to know that we did not meet your expectations. Summary: My husband and I stayed here this past weekend. He paid a little more than usual, expecting to get a better quality stay. The room's appearance looks great, modern décor makes you feel luxuriously in style. Once we tried out the bed, it all went downhill from there. The bed is extremely firm, even with a mattress pad on it. The bathroom is small. We also killed a large spider that was roaming the ceiling. I hate spiders, figured they used exterminator services to try and not have scenarios like that happen. Usually we get a continental breakfast included with our stays as well, but here you had to purchase breakfast. The overall décor of the hotel inside is also very nice, they did not have the air on in the hallways though and as it was the hottest day of the year... it was
Manager Response: We are disheartened to hear about your mediocre stay with us. Please know that we have sent your comments to our proper departments. This is an opportunity for us to improve so that we will meet and exceed future guests' expectations. Be well.

Summary: As soon as we got there after an exhausting trip I knew we were in good hands because the man behind the desk couldn't have been more welcoming or informative. The beds were extremely comfortable, they were always well made. The waiters were all very friendly and polite. The food was always good every morning. One suggestion I would make is that the evening and lunch menu could be improved by including desserts on it. A very enjoyable stay!
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay very much. The room was very clean, well appointed, comfortable bed and QUIET! The location was perfect for our needs, easy access to the freeway and surface streets. The staff was friendly, polite and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear W9150ZDwilliamw,  Thank you so much for the kind words and review!  We are so pleased you thoroughly enjoyed your recent getaway, and ecstatic that you chose The Hotel Fullerton for it!  Please visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean, quiet but lacks a coffee shop that opens longer hours
Summary: Wifi is kinda slow in the lobby. In the room is fine. Room is OK, nothing extraordinary...but clean. Staff very friendly.   But it's not convenient if you don't have a car. There are nothing interesting around if you want to walk and do some browsing...it's not downtown Fullerton!  I was here for meetings, so it didn't matter.
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear that you did not find anything to do in the local area to our hotel.  We do provide a complimentary shuttle to Disneyland, Downtown Disney and downtown Fullerton!  Hopefully on your next visit you can utilize this service!  Hope to see you soon!

Summary: The property was nice and so was our room.  We had a room right in front of the pool which was nice, although we never had a chance to get in.  Plenty of restaurants near by and not far from Disneyland.  Never had an issue finding parking.  Beds were on smaller size but overall a great hotel!
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary Heading: Decent place to stay - Great staff
Summary: I had read the reviews before I went, so I wrote to the manager when I booked the hotel. He was kind enough to reply immediately and fulfill all our requests, so that's great!  Pros:  The hotel staff was very nice. Free parking. Free Wi-Fi. Clean pool. Fridge in room. Lovely grounds!  Cons: Small rooms. Very small bathroom! Shower didn't work too well.   Not sure why this place is 3.5 star. It's 3, at most.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your stay and although you may not have fully enjoyed your time with us know that we strive daily to ensure that our guests leave feeling even better than when they arrived. Be well.

Summary: Pros: -Hotel grounds are nicely landscaped, specifically the courtyard/pool area. -Good customer service at the front desk, however when calling to from your room to request something, good luck if it ever arrives.  Cons: -Apparently the rooms in the "executive" wing are updated and modern as compared to their regular rooms, a pro if you land a room in the executive wing but a con if you don't.  We ended going from a regular room to an executive room and in all honesty it feels like going from a motel to an actual motel. -The gym, a really bad gym.  The equipment must be from the 90's and the cardio equipment in particular was very unstable and felt unsafe to use.  I mean their treadmills are made by Reebok, who knew Reebok even makes treadmills?! -Not a very good location, not
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. Although you satisfactorily enjoyed your stay we are disheartened to know that we did not meet your expectations. Summary Heading: Don't judge a book by its cover
Summary: Love this hotel.  Freeway close, convenient to OC points of interest.  I stay here when I come to visit my OC friends.  Rooms are clean and comfortable, staff is friendly and helpful.  Grounds, especially center of the complex, are beautiful.  Good breakfast with lots of options.  Only downside is the neighborhood, but hotel is set off far enough from freeway and surroundings to make it a non-issue.  Will definitely visit again!

Summary: The hotel was what you would expect from a 3 star hotel. It is located in a convenient location, right off the main freeway. The service was excellent and the rooms were clean and comfortable. I would recommend this motel to anyone passing through.

Seems great at first 1130 we are back at room go to get into bed and note there is hair, NOT OUR HAIR, in the bed.  We know it's not ours cause we hadn't been in bed. Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for your stay.  We are truly disheartened that you did not leave feeling even better than when you arrived. Summary: Very comfortable and clean room. The pool are was clean and was a good size. My family enjoyed our stay and will be  staying  here again on our next visit. The staff was also very welcoming and courteous.

I don't have a single complaint, they were so helpful in making this a wonderful experience.  I booked the rooms in advance and they stayed in touch with me all the way up until the day we arrived to make sure everything would be ready as we needed it. Summary Heading: Great hotel staff. Good amenities and pool.

Summary: I had to move hotels because my company accidentally booked me in an extended stay that allowed pets and I am very allergic.  I showed up here expecting the worst but actually really liked the place.  The reason I was a little concerned was the location looked so industrial.  The hotel was clean and my room was great.  The breakfast isn't included which while traveling for business isn't ideal but wasn't too expensive.  The staff were great and no complaints there.  I had to call at least 1 time per day to get my free login to the wifi to work and it was about as slow as it gets.  I don't understand why hotels don't go to the extra expense to offer free wifi to their guests.  It is just too common and so needed while people are traveling.  It is an expense that should just be a
