Summary: I stayed in Hotel Fullerton last Jun 6 - 9, 2015, not by choice but the Travel Agency booked me in this Hotel.  Disappointing, its not in the Prime Location,  there was nothing in the vicinity  of the hotel, no shops, no restaurants, nothing, feels like you were stranded in nowhere. Rooms were average and you can hear the guest next door. But the downside in the location was compensated by the  excellent service of the staff. They were very accommodating, polite and very helpful.  Special mention to the Night Manager,  Mr. Dela Serna in his welcoming, cheerful and can do attitude was enough to recommend this hotel to family and friends.  Nila, the shuttle driver was very helpful  and knowledgeable. Exceptional Service was the selling point of the hotel.
Manager Response: What a great review to read. We will make sure to recognize our staff member that went above and beyond to make your stay the best. Do visit us again soon so that we may continue our tradition of providing stellar service. Thank and safe travels.

Summary: Not in the best location, so I took a gamble - and it was a good gamble.  Honestly - pleasantly surprised; Clean, nice sized rooms, comfy beds, organic shampoo, great restaurant, and wonderful breakfast. The staff was also very helpful. I really can't complain, and I'm a complainer.
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary Heading: You might want to stay at another place!
Summary: We are in the Fullerton area for three nights. I wanted to find a place close to family and attractions. I found the (secret deal) on Travelocity. You are promised the hotel will be atleast 3 and a half stars and in the area you want. But you have to prepay upfront and it is nonrefundable . You also do not know which Hotel it is until you pay with your credit card. Well lucky us we got the Hotel Fullerton. Upon arrival it really does not look like a hotel. It looks more like a Motel from back in the day. Do people still use that word? Anyway we requested two queen beds. It is my wife and I , also my youngest son . We were given a room with two double beds . They are VERY small. And they are VERY hard. You can almost feel the springs. I'm not inpressed at all. This bed is not big
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for your stay.  We are truly disheartened that you did not leave feeling even better than when you arrived.  Please know that our department heads are taking a close look at your comments so that they may be able to identify and make the proper adjustments so that future guests may be able to enjoy their stay completely.   Should you wish to discuss this further we invite you to send a note to brett.smissen@hfullerton.com.

Summary Heading: Disappointing - events take priority over guests
Summary: I waited to do this review because when I tried to write a review immediately after my stay I could not contain my anger at the way we were treated. We were there for an informal college reunion for my husband, the first one where he actually needed a hotel since he'd always lived in SoCal for past reunions. The first 2 nights of our 3-night stay were ok, breakfast was gross, but the room was acceptable. Then the 3rd night was terrible. It made for a very long day the next day since we had to be up early. An event was being held downstairs that featured a DJ and dancing. Our room was on the third floor, and yet we were still very disturbed by the loud music and thumping base. I have a white noise app on my phone I use when I travel but the music was louder than that. The hotel
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for your stay.  We are truly disheartened that you did not leave feeling even better than when you arrived.  Please know that our department heads are taking a close look at your comments so that they may be able to identify and make the proper adjustments so that future guests may be able to enjoy their stay completely.     I invite you to respond back to me personally at brett.smissen@hfullerton.com, so that I may procure additional information in an effort to make this right for you and future guests.  Thank you and be well!

Summary: Decided to stay at the hotel Fullerton for once and give it a try. As soon as I walked in I was greeted and they provided a friendly service as I was checking in. Checking in process was easy. As I checked in, the room was quite nice and clean. Any problems I had, the front desk handled it quickly and efficiently. My stay was nice. Totally recommend to any people that are staying in the area!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your stay and although you may not have fully enjoyed your time with us know that we strive daily to ensure that our guests leave feeling even better than when they arrived. Be well.

Summary: With just a camera phone in hand, my Hospitality Management class needed to film a video on Customer Service Recovery and Checking Hotel Guests In and Out. We got the okay to film our two skits and were lucky that the night manager, Alex, was around. Although we were not paying guests, we were impressed that we were not treated as just another group of kids that needed a watchful eye. He was definitely very attentive and an excellent listener, but  he did so without making us feel unwelcomed or uncomfortable, checking politely how we were doing and even catching a couple actions we had overlooked and offering helpful suggestions we were able to include in our skits. Alex definitely went above and beyond in service. Thank you very much for your hospitality.
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary Heading: Great hotel location, good prices, clean rooms and friendly management
Summary: My friends and I decided to visit Southern California for our spring break. During our visit we stayed at this hotel. The staff and management were friendly and responsive to our needs and questions. The rooms were clean and good sized. The location is near all the popular Orange County attractions. Our trip and stay was great. Will book it again next time we visit.
Manager Response: What a great review to read. We will make sure to recognize our staff member that went above and beyond to make your stay the best. Do visit us again soon so that we may continue our tradition of providing stellar service. Thank and safe travels.

Summary: i had a wonderful time here. The staff was very friendly and the bedroom was so comfortable I felt at home with a special service. I most definitely recommend this place to my friends and family. Thank you for the welcome stay I will come back again
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: The inside and grounds looked lovely and the staff was very nice. Great shuttle service and full breakfast was served. Bad experience - cockroaches in the room - one made it into my makeup bag and came home with me - yuk!  I have traveled for many years and in many places. This is the worst experience ever!!!
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for your stay.  We are truly disheartened that you did not leave feeling even better than when you arrived. Summary: The staff at this hotel is the best by far. From the moment I picked up the phone and made a call to this hotel, I realized we had a gem in our hands. Yogini Geria along with her colleagues, Dan Cano, Bret, and the entire housekeeping staff, made our stay at the hotel the best yet! The hotel is immaculate! The ladies at the front desk were very friendly. They went above and beyond our expectations. The decor in these rooms is very stylish and modern. They are beautiful! The sheets smell clean and fresh. Harney Middle School from Las Vegas, NV has found a new home away from home! :)  Way to go!
Manager Response: What a great review to read. We will make sure to recognize our staff member that went above and beyond to make your stay the best. Do visit us again soon so that we may continue our tradition of providing stellar service. Thank and safe travels.

Summary: After a hectic 8 day tour on the east coast (with some questionable hotels), it was great to get to California and this hotel. It is a mid size hotel with a boutique style atmosphere, just 20 minutes from Disneyland. The staff are so friendly and helpful. From the front desk (Britney & Imelda) to the bar (Oliver) who has your drinks order down pat after your first visit, to house keeping/room service staff and the shuttle drivers. The duty manager (Alex) certainly had it running like clockwork. It was an unexpected surprise and it was a great way to finish our trip to the states.
Manager Response: What a great review to read. We will make sure to recognize our staff member that went above and beyond to make your stay the best. Do visit us again soon so that we may continue our tradition of providing stellar service. Thank and safe travels.

Summary Heading: Regret staying here for the weekend of my wedding.
Summary: This hotel is not all that it's jazzed to be on it's website. We stayed here for the weekend of our wedding (3 nights) and if we hadn't poured almost $600 into it, we would've left and gone somewhere else.  First night, our refrigerator wasn't working... We wish we'd known that before bringing our perishable foods in. The water pressure was absolutely terrible. The second night, the alarms/detectors were chirping and took awhile to get someone to look at it. The room and floor we were on is in desparate need of some TLC.  The staff made me feel like I was low-class, bottom-of-the-shoe person. They hardly said anything to us when checking in and we had to 'bother' them to get questions answered. The food at the restaurant was sub-par... Not worth the money we paid for it.   We
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for your stay.  We are truly disheartened that you did not leave feeling even better than when you arrived.  Please know that our department heads are taking a close look at your comments so that they may be able to identify and make the proper adjustments so that future guests may be able to enjoy their stay completely. Summary Heading: Decent hotel... especially for the price.
Summary: After having to take a last minute business trip, I found that many of the hotels in the area - Anaheim, Brea, etc. - were sold out or very expensive and then I stumbled across this hotel. Having never heard of it and not too familiar with Fullerton, I reluctantly booked this hotel, but I knew I didn't need much. Located right off the freeway, I pulled up to this hotel late at night. At night, the cool neon is inviting. The staff was extremely friendly and the rooms were pretty decent, clean and just fine. As I got in late at night, I didn't take advantage of any of the food options or pool. The interior grounds and common areas seemed nice. And parking was free. Could be an alternative to families who just need a place to stay while visiting Anaheim-area attractions. It was a
Manager Response: What a great review! We're pleased that you discovered us among the many options in the area, and are happy you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary Heading: Very good service and supporting staff at The Hotel Fullerton
Summary: We had recently stayed at The Hotel Fullerton for 3 nights during our tour to Disney Land. It was a great experience. The free shuttle service was really worth and easy. All the staff were friendly and supportive  to extra mile as they could. Hats of to Mr. Andy who manages transportation. I would highly recommend Fullerton for travelers who wish to visit Disney... we will surely come back
Manager Response: What a great review to read. We will make sure to recognize Andy, who went above and beyond to make your stay the best. Do visit us again soon so that we may continue our tradition of providing stellar service. Thank and safe travels.

Summary: We are staying at this hotel currently while we are in town for a Wynonna concert.  The rooms are updated and nice looking, but with some maintenance issues (leaking shower/tub and paint).  Room service and check in were great.  However, for more than an hour tonight there were people running through the halls, slamming doors, yelling, laughing and screaming.  There is a loud party and talking in at least one room near ours.  It is both annoying and scary and impossible to sleep.  Security has been by, but nothing is stopping this.  I don't know if the rooms' soundproofing is totally inadequate (as we heard kids running up and down the halls in the afternoon) or this hotel caters to a rowdy crowd, but this is one of our worst hotel stays in recent years.  I would NEVER stay at
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for what you experienced here in our hotel. What you have mentioned is not a clear representation of our standards and expectations. We strive very hard to have you leave us feeling even better than when you arrived. And in this case we did not meet that goal. I do hope that when your future travels bring you to the area, you will give as an opportunity to make it right for you.  Be well.

Summary: On 2/7/15 myself and my family stayed in room #210. Shortly after returning to our room after being gone all day at the Zoo, we notice our Shower was not functioning. There was absolute no water pressure, so will you pulled the shower lever no water would come out the shower faucet. It was also covered in mildew and 'blue gunk'. I also tried to turn on the air conditioning, this also would not power on after 20 minutes or so trying. I tried to contact the first desk to have someone from mantience to be sent to our room, However the telephone was ALSO broken!. I went down to the front desk around 10pm and complained. I mentioned I had 2 small children, it was late and our shower, telephone and air conditioner was broken. He said he would send someone right away. 25 minutes later
Manager Response: Hi Ms. Short, we're just checking in to make certain that you didn't have any additional questions since our last chat. We hope that our follow-up was to your liking and that you are more likely to give us another shot in the future. Please let us know when you plan to return to the area. We assure you that you'll have a pleasant stay!

Summary: Second stay here for the NAMM convention.  Still a great bargain for the price.  Booked through getaroom.com this time and saved even more!  Room on the downstairs level was the tiniest bit more worn-in than our previous room but still such a fantastic price for what you get.    Friendly personnel, clean room and grounds, not much to dislike here.  About the only things I can whine about is that the light on the magnifying makeup mirror didn't function, the pool towels are pretty threadbare and not many are left out, and I wish they would empty the ashtrays in the courtyard more often (since we were banished there by virtue of a non-smoking room--that was the trade off for having two beds and a ground-floor room this time)!    They've switched their toiletries to eco-friendly
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: We booked this hotel last minute through Hotel Tonight and got a pretty good deal. Because it wasn't a chain, we were slightly worried over how the hotel would be. We worried for nothing!!  As soon as you enter the hotel, you are welcomed into a gorgeous lobby. Very classy looking, and the staff was very friendly. We were checked in promptly and the staff was helpful and friendly. The room we had was very clean and the sheets, shower, washroom, and overall quality of the bed / design/ decor were top notch!  There is a nice pool and hot tub that is surrounded but he other rooms, and is very nice. There are two restaurants attached to the hotel, ad the hotel also arrives fee shuttle to Disney. We would stay here again in a heartbeat if we could! I would definitely recommend it.
Manager Response: What a great review to read. We will make sure to recognize our staff member that went above and beyond to make your stay the best. We are pleased to hear that you so thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us!  Do visit us again soon so that we may continue our tradition of providing stellar service. Thank and safe travels.

Summary: After reading some of the reviews, I wasn't sure what to expect.  We booked 2 rooms through Groupon, so our rooms were already assigned when we got there.  I requested tower rooms based on reviews seen here, but was told we had rooms which faced the freeway - one of the things recommended to avoid.  Oh well, we were only staying one night.  We are all very pleasantly surprised by the whole experience.  Parking was right by the front door.  We could have a bellman bring up the luggage or they had large carts for do-it-yourselfers.  We did have 2 rooms next to each other, which was very convenient. The hotel has placed a wall with windows that open on the other side of the hall so it is not open to the freeway.  We did not hear it at all.  The rooms were very clean with a minor
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: I stayed here for just one night as it was close to the destination I needed to be at early the next morning. The lady that checked me in at the front desk was not very professional in my opinion. She did not smile once and barely spoke to me. When I was asking her questions in regards to what was going to be placed on my card, she replied in a snobby and rude manner almost as if she was too good to be assisting me. I work in hotels and did not find this to be satisfying. She also had her phone out during the process. I had booked a double qnqn because no kings were available and she told me there were none to switch to. With that said, I left and went to work. I came back and night and spoke with another front desk agent named Alex who was more than helpful. He spent a good 30
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for what you experienced here in our hotel. What you have mentioned is not a clear representation of our standards and expectations. We strive very hard to have you leave us feeling even better than when you arrived. And in this case we did not meet that goal. Know that we are looking into your comments regarding your check in experience, so that we can use it as a tool to learn and exceed our guests expectations. Be well.

Summary: We stayed here as part of our honeymoon. It's not close to Disneyland but has a free shuttle. We hired a car to travel to Magic Mountain, universal and Knotts Berry Farm. Free parking was excellent. The room was exceptionally clean, housekeeping were excellent. Reception was very professional, they let us check in early at 10am free of charge. Definitely stay in the towers. Wifi was fast enough to stream but we had to re log in everyday.
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: I stayed here to go to a concert at the Honda Center and we decided to also go to Disneyland. The hotel is a little away from both but that was not an issue. The hotel offered a free shuttle to both events for us. The staff was very polite and the room was clean. The only issue was that the bar hours did not work for us. We just wanted a cold beer and the bar closed from 2-5 every day! Who does that??? So we had to drive to get a six pack. So be prepared to BYOB.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. Although you satisfactorily enjoyed your stay we are disheartened to know that we did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to bring up your comments to the proper departments so that they may be able to resolve any issues that may hinder the enjoyment of our guests. Thank you again and our sincere apologies for the shortcomings. Be well.

Summary: This was my second stay at this property.  The first visit the property was a Crowne branded property.  Everything appears to have improved since this change.  The new furnishings have brought new life back to this conveniently located full service hotel.  The pool is large and clean.  Then only complaint is lack of dining options.  They offer a buffet breakfast and dinner served in the lounge.  This is not a problem if you have a car as there are several great dining options close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your stay and although you may not have fully enjoyed your time with us know that we strive daily to ensure that our guests leave feeling even better than when they arrived. Be well.

Summary: I just stayed at the Hotel Fullerton for an event. My check in was quick and the staff was friendly. I stayed in one of the Tower rooms and evidently, that is the ticket. This hotel is a handful of plus and minuses. The neighborhood is industrial and not great, but it is also right off the freeway. Some of the rooms no doubt do not have the best of views, but there is a courtyard. My room in the tower overlooked a roof and freeway in the distance. At the same time, just down the elevator were conference rooms and they suggested I park in the back, which was close. There is a nice bar area between the tower and front desk where I paused to check the football game. My room was clean and neat. It's updated without being overly trendy. There was an old-school A/C unit that was

Summary: This hotel was so nice and right off of the freeway. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were super clean and beds were very comfortable. Our bathroom was big and spacious. The room was so quiet and we never heard anything from neighbors or the outside. I would definetly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your stay and although you may not have fully enjoyed your time with us know that we strive daily to ensure that our guests leave feeling even better than when they arrived. Be well.

Summary: Place was good. Clean and had the basic necessities. Didn't have the best sleep though. The mattress was tough. AC turned off in the middle of the night and I had a big headache when I woke up. Pros:  good front desk customer service, they let us extend our stay til 2! That was extra nice. I left my blanket accidentally and I was still able to retrieve it. Free parking as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your stay and although you may not have fully enjoyed your time with us know that we strive daily to ensure that our guests leave feeling even better than when they arrived. Be well.

Summary: We took a cruise from Vancouver to LA, and we needed a place to spend the night, so we decided to stay for 3 nights, and visit Disneyland, Knotts Berry farm, and Universal while we were here.Fullerton Hotel was perfectly located, and they have a free shuttle bus that takes you right to Disneyland, and back.The hotel is clean, the staff very friendly and helpful.Comfy bed but they could use bigger pillows.The rooms are attractive, but there was no microwave, and no breakfast.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. Although you satisfactorily enjoyed your stay we are disheartened to know that we did not meet your expectations. Thank you again and our sincere apologies for the shortcomings. Be well.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel/Motel a number of times. The experience is very different depending on which part of the hotel you stay in. I have stayed in the tower, very hotel like, but on this trip I ended up on the end of the hotel past the pool. The hallways are open to the outside, so it is more like a motel. There is a large gap under the door and the doors are very heavy. All night long I listened to doors open and close and people walk up and down steps and in the walkways. There was a party in the lounge the night I arrived and apparently several revelers decided to bring the party back to their room at 1 am. At 3 am I had to call security to quiet them down. There seems to be little to no soundproofing in the rooms. The next night some older man was wandering the
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for what you experienced here in our hotel. What you have mentioned is not a clear representation of our standards and expectations. We strive very hard to have you leave us feeling even better than when you arrived. And in this case we did not meet that goal. Know that we are looking into different noise options for our guestrooms so that future guests may enjoy their time fully. Be well.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights recently and was overall very happy with our choice.  Location:  The hotel is about 30 mins to an hour away from Hollywood/Bev Hills areas depending on traffic which was pretty bad when we were in town?  It is however only 5m ins away from anaheim and the Disney resort and I believe they even offer a shuttle although we never used it as we were driving.  The surrounding area as others have mentioned is a little Industrial but we were not disturbed by any noise of note and felt perfectly safe.  There was a cheap gas station opposite the hotel.  Lobby:  Lobby area was very nice with marble tiles and good high quality furnishings.  The lobby gave the feel and impression of a hotel far more expensive than the price paid.  Check In:  Check in was quick,
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. Although you satisfactorily enjoyed your stay we are disheartened to know that we did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to bring up your comments to the proper departments so that they may be able to resolve any issues that may hinder the enjoyment of our guests. Thank you again and our sincere apologies for the shortcomings. Be well.

Summary: Came here for a mini vacation with my fiancé. I must say, this is one of the best hotels we have been to; excellent customer services, the staff were super helpful and friendly! Amazing view from our room... Thumbs up!!! Pricing were also so reasonable and affordable.  Will definitely stay here again on our next visit. Highly recommend!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words about our awesome staff!  We are honored and proud to have been able to make your experience a memorable one!  Do visit us again in the future!

Summary: This is a wonderful hotel! The staff was very friendly, helpful and professional. The room I stayed in was clean. I could see part of the Disneyland fireworks the night I stayed there. Right next to the freeway so it was super convenient. Quite a few places to eat around the hotel. Just a few minutes away from Disneyland, the Honda Center, the mall and other attractions. If you're looking for a hotel with a reasonable price that's clean with a great staff, this is the place to stay at!
Manager Response: We certainly do appreciate your kind words and comments about our hotel!  We hope when your future travels bring you back to the area you choose our hotel again for your visit!  Have a great day!

Summary: I have stayed here for the first time over last weekend and it was a great experience.  As soon as I called for room service, they were fast and very nice.  I would definitely come back again. The price is cheap for the weekend compared to the other hotels I was looking at. I am glad I made the right choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome comments about our hotel! We are pleased to know it was convenient for you as well as economical! Please do visit us again soon!

Summary: this was a great hotel, i stayed there for my trip to Disneyland last year,  the rooms are clean and tidy, the staff were more than helpful with any and all questions i had, and there were many  i had a room overlooking the highway, it wasn't noisy at all, and i could see the fireworks from Disney from my window,  there are a couple of vending machines in the lobby if you're feeling peckish after the restaurant closes,the restaurant had lovely food, the only problem i had with it was, i went in and sat down and had to wait twenty or so mins before someone came to take my order, yet other people coming in after me got served. there is also a courtesy bus that takes you anywhere within a 5 mile radius, so it will get you to Disney and the Honda Center no problems,  it might be
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: It took one generous and thoughtful agent to fix a Murphy's Law. Flights got delayed, checked in late, had problems with the A/C, refrigerator, musty mildew smell in the room, and neighbor had a party or room full of people being loud given it was midnight. After being helped by several staff members unsuccessfully, I must say, Leo Wang was very professional and went beyond my expectation. He addressed all my concerns and made sure I was content before he took off. Breakfast had good selections. Hotel is near the freeway, so expect noise-free zone.
Manager Response: What a splendid review! I am so glad to hear that Leo was able to assist you with your travel needs! Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: the initial impression was worrying as positioned right on the edge of the freeway but the hotel is quiet and clean and you would not know the freeway was there.  Great swimming pool and plenty of choices for food both in the hotel and very close by.  Room nice but bed too soft for us older ones! Staff pleasant and helpful but WiFi difficult, had to get reset everyday and as we are furthest away from reception it was a little inconvenient but sorted quickly every day. Would recommend for a very nice budget stay.
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: My husband and I are not very big into hotels but his place was great. We checked in with a very friendly staff member and we were surprised as to how clean the room was. We requested for more towels, which were delivered to us within 10 min. Would definitely recommend this place to our family and friends!
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you and be well!

Summary: We recently stayed at the Hotel Fullerton in Fullerton and found it rather handsome and clean, The bathroom was quite cramped although the fixtures were modern. No free breakfast is included although there is an attached restaurant with limited operating hours abd rather pricey The hotel is conveniently located right next to the 91 freeway The concierge was extraordinary and extremely helpful
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. Although you satisfactorily enjoyed your stay we are disheartened to know that we did not meet your expectations in regards to the size of the bathroom and the breakfast options. We will make sure to bring up your comments to the proper departments so that they may be able to resolve any issues that may hinder the enjoyment of our guests. Thank you again and our sincere apologies for the shortcomings. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel, excellent staff and greatly located.
Summary: The minute you walk in you will be impressed by the beautiful lobby, lounge and courtyard.  The Fullerton Hotel is managed superbly.  This is apparent by the attention to detail from the staff and cleanliness of the hotel.  There is an elegant and modern feel throughout the property.  The rooms are specious with nice size flat screen TVs.   I would certainly recommend this hotel to any business and leisure stay.
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible. Thank you so much!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel after celebrating my brother birthday a couple month back.  The hotel rooms where very nice, neat, and clean. I was very much impressed and decided to use this hotel to accommodate my wedding guest for my up coming wedding.  I work with Veronica and she has been awesome. She has handled all the accommodations from the rooms to shuttle service.  She has put me at ease and feel confident entrusting her with making this day go smoothly.
Manager Response: What a great review to read!  We are excited that you enjoyed your recent stay with us, and look forward to serving you again soon!  Safe travels.

Summary: Didn't know exactly what to expect when booked this hotel. I was pleased with the comfort I felt while there. It was clean and quiet. Easy to find.Has a shuttle to take you to Disneyland free with free parking at hotel.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you found your recent stay with us so relaxing!  Please visit us again soon so that we may provide you with the service experience that you greatly deserve.  Have a great day!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay & for conferences
Summary: I attended a work conference here in July '14, and it was a really great experience.   Free parking, great food, and a nice atmosphere.   The people who work here make the difference. Very good service.   I will definitely come back. It would be a good wedding venue as well.
Manager Response: Dear Sonya T,  Thanks for taking your time to give us the feedback. At The Hotel Fullerton we strive to exceed your expectations throughout your  entire visit. We are so happy that your had enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your recommendation to all other future guests.  Thanks!

Summary: The Hotel Fullerton & Conference Center was Exactly what I needed.The hotel was Clean, smelled nice, and nice people. Excellent customer service. I would definitely book this place again. Everyone is professional and helpful. The price for the room was fair.
Manager Response: What a great review! We hope you enjoyed your time. Do visit us again soon so that we may be able to provide you with the best stay possible.

Summary: Gotta say, I was very impressed to find a hotel like this in the city of Fullerton.  Stayed here for 2 nights total.  Do not judge a book by its cover because you're wrong.  The outside of the hotel does not do justice for this hotel.  Lobby, bar and most importantly  the room was clean and in excellent quality. Personally, what push this place over the top was the Wi-Fi connection.  Strong connection and fast internet is a must because i do a lot of my business online. My only gripe was the early check it as the room was not ready to be checked in early, which is disappointing but I cannot fault them.  Great hotel, would come.
Manager Response: Dear Mac N,  At The Hotel Fullerton we strive to exceed your expectations throughout your  entire visit. Thanks for your time and feedback.  We do offer early check in subject to availability. I feel sorry that we can't do that to you due to the high occupancy. We are so happy that your had enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your recommendation to all other future guests. Thanks!

Summary: My girlfriend and I took a vacation down to SoCal, and we decided to stay here, since it was close to Disneyland. Surprisingly, this hotel has one of the best services I ever been to. I thought I was at a 5 stars hotel in New York. When I ask for more towels and pillows, the staff were more than happy to help and had it brought up within matter of minutes. The restaurant inside the hotel was pretty good to dine at. I love my experience here overall, and would recommend it to everyone.
Manager Response: Dear Johny H,  Thanks for your review and recommendation to all others. We feel proud as we are non brand hotel, we do keep our standard up and even better than when we were branded hotel. Example, We do offer all rooms with PAYA organic shampoo, conditioner, and bath gel effective September 2014.

Summary: Came to Anaheim area for Disneyland and stumble upon this hotel since everywhere else was out of our family budget, didn’t expect much since it was a non brand hotel.  But when we got to the hotel it was beautiful, the hotel was clean and room looks new and renovated.  Best part of my stay was when I found out they have free shuttle to Disneyland.  For a family traveling on a budget, I cannot ask for more.  I would definitely come back when I’m visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Ali0159,  Thanks for your feed back. We are so pleased to hear that you and family had enjoyed a good time with us, especially our shuttle service. We look forward to see you in the near future.

Summary: Excellent service and friendly staff, clean and comfortable room. Competitive pricing as well compared to the surrounding hotels. No complaints. My friends and I would come back again for our future trips.
Manager Response: Dear thucool,  Thanks for taking your time to write us a review. A good review means a lot to us.

Summary: This hotel is only on the edge of Fullerton. I should have checked its location.  It IS next to the 91 and our room's windows were not sound-proof.  The hotel is shabby and dated. The restaurant and bar are at best passable if you're desperate. The management allowed loud partying to go on all night around the pool (which is in the center of the property) which only helped drown out the freeway noise.  When I called to complain at 1 am, the noise continued at least one half hour more.  I wish I'd picked a chain hotel with sound proofing:  always a good idea in Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear Tuva F,  Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback regarding your recent stayed.  We apologize that you had to experience the disturbance from other guests while staying at our hotel.  We will make sure our future guests will not experience the same disturbance.

Summary: I stayed at the hotel Fullerton and my stay was quite enjoyable.The restaurant inside the hotel has very good food.clean and good service.The waitress was very helpful in suggesting which dishes to order.
Manager Response: At The Hotel Fullerton we strive to exceed your expectations throughout your  entire visit. Thanks for your time and feedback.

Summary: Was bumped to this hotel after Embassy gave my room away even with credit card guarantee.   Arrived at hotel past midnight with front-desk manager dealing with a security issue (a guest was trying to go into another guest room, don't know full story).    The way this security issue was handled was not reassuring to me as new guest at all.   The front-desk manager ended up telling the security guy that "you are security, you deal with it".  After checking in, needed a rollaway, and extra pillows.   1/2 hour later, the security guy was doing his 2nd job and delivered these items to me.   The entrance behind the building had sign stating key card is required, but the door was not locked at all.  All these things I saw within 30 mins of arriving just made me question if there's any
Manager Response: Dear Sweetandsour1,  Thanks for taking time to send us the feedback. We will look into it and get it correct and fix immediately. Again, thanks for giving us an opportunity to serve you.

Summary: We stayed here back in March when a friend and I were taking a trip to Disneyland. For what we paid for (we found a groupon deal), the hotel met our expectations. Location wise, it is right next to the high way so driving is convenient and they also provided a shuttle to Disneyland (make sure you sign up ahead of time). The room was clean and the bed was really comfortable. The only thing I would complain about (but this wasn't the hotel's fault) was the noise we heard from the rooms next door (they were not PG rated), but otherwise it was a good stay and we would be back again if we are in the area.
Manager Response: A Pleasant Stay  Thanks for taking your time and recommendation us to other future guests. I really appreciate your positive feedback and I will definitely share your review with my team. Looking forward to see you in the near future! Thanks!

Summary Heading: overly priced and  non responsive responsive
Summary: The bed was great but the experience left much to be desired. Through no fault of ours, our hotel in another city was given away late at night when we arrived. We had to find another hotel which was not easy on a recent Saturday night. After several hours of driving around and calling hotels we arrived in Anaheim and an very helpful night clerk found us a reservation at Hotel Fullerton. This was approx 2:30am. We were told we had 15 min to arrive or the room would be given away. We were not asked for a credit card. We arrived within 15 minutes, paid $250. plus $25 tax for a total of $275 for the room. At 3am I called down and said the internet did not work. They told me it ahd been rebooted. It still did not work nor did it work at 8 am. We departed at 8:30. Upon arriving home
Manager Response: Dear Donna,  Thank you for taking your time to give us some feedback regarding your previous visit to the Anaheim-Fullerton area.  We appreciate all the comments and feedback that guests have to offer.    We apologize that the rate for our rooms are not as you want it to be.  Room rates fluctuate; the room rate around the area for that particular day was average at $300  plus tax a night.  Rate is publish on the registration card upon check in and are acknowledge by guests' signature prior to receiving a key to the room.    We do feel sorry that this review was based on the AGREED ROOM RATE.  If you have any other services comment or feedback, you're more than welcome to let us know.    Thank You

Summary: We stayed here for two nights. We chose this hotel because most hotels in LA had been either full or ridiculously expensive due to the holiday season. There were plenty of parking space.  Service was not very good as we waited for a while for check-in even though the front desk was not very busy. Moreover, WiFi was not automatically provided during check-in. We need to call the front desk when we later discovered that no password was provided in the room. In addition, housekeeping only provided us with bath towels on the second day and didn't provide hand towels and the smaller towels (she simply took them away).  We were allocated a room in the ground floor. It was reasonably clean but some small insects were found. The room conveniently provides a refrigerator. Bathtub is
Manager Response: Dear Divine F,  Thanks for writing us the review. I do really appreciate your feedback and observations. I will definitely look into it and correct them immediately. The room rate is always base on the demand from the market, I feel sorry that you have paid in the peak season. If I may suggest you, book ahead of time can save you money, please try our website to book as advance purchase to receive big discount. Again, Thanks to your time.

Summary: Last night was my first time staying at the Hotel Fullerton after I found it with a good price on Hotel Tonight. I decided to venture out of my normal hotel zone near Disneyland and check this place out. As a business traveler it seemed to have everything you might need including an on-site restaurant, bar, laundry, etc.  Overall my experience was pretty good with the exception of the air conditioner which would not cool the room for me. The room was hot. The air conditioning in my room did not really cool down the room being on full blast for 8 hours. It made it less hot, but that just made it good enough to sleep moderately OK.   Pros: On-Site Restaurant Friendly staff that I met My room was quiet for being next to the freeway Free WiFi  Cons: Bad Air Conditioning  Nothing
Manager Response: Dear Casey M,   Thank you for staying with us and providing us with your valuable feedback. We strive to ensure all of our guests needs are met and we are pleased to know that the service you received and the wifi were to your liking and contributed to making your stay that much more comfortable. Please accept our deepest apologies for the issues you had encountered with the air conditioner. Rest assured that we take all comments and suggestions to heart so that we can improve and provide the exceptional service that our guests expect and deserve.  Once again many thanks for your feedback and we would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.   Sincerely,   Karen C Case Manager IHGCare

Summary: I traveled to Fullerton on July 14 with my daughter for Troy Hight School visiting. We found Hotel Fullerton by the school staff recommendation. This is a very well maintenance hotel. Front desk was very professional housekeeping staff was very friendly smiling face. Our room was perfectly clean...  I definitely stay her next time when i come to this area.
Manager Response: Dear JenKrist,  Thanks for taking time to send your feedback to us, we really appreciate your positive review and I would definitely share your comment with all my team.  Thank You

Summary: I stayed here when my sister had her graduation from CSUF. I had a very pleasant stay. Lots of great amenities. I know where I'm staying if I need to go to Fullerton again. As an aside, Fullerton's got a great nightlife but when I got back to the hotel, it was so nice to enjoy a trouble-free night (very quiet in the hotel).
Manager Response: Dear Keith,  At The Hotel Fullerton we strive to exceed your expectations throughout your  entire visit. We really appreciate you to take time to give us a review. Especially a positive review, I am sure all my staff will be encouraged by your review and we looking forward to see you soon!  Thanks!  Charles

Summary: Visited this property by join my neice college graduation party and stayed a night on 6/28/14. If you have business or personal events in Los Angeles or Orange Co. area, this property is ideal. The environment is comfortable and the rooms are quiet and clean. The hotel is located pretty close to the freeway and Disney and Angels Stadium. Very nice restaurant, Bar, courtyard.... The staff was friendly and helpful. Overall this is a very modern updated hotel...
Manager Response: Dear Claire,  Thanks for your review! A positive review means a lot to me, especially all my staffs. I do see you had enjoyed our executive floor with all special amenities. I appreciate your recommendation to all others. We wish to see you again soon!  Thanks!  Charles

Summary: This hotel has running a lot of tour groups. I would not choose it originally, but since they have separate building and a separate breakfast area, it appears it is under controlled. I became OK and really enjoy the new room and restaurant. I will stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  At The Hotel Fullerton we strive to exceed your expectations throughout your  entire visit. We thank you for your time and feedback, we will definitely keep our best to meet all guests needs. Thanks!

Summary: I travel frequently for work and due to a last minute trip had to reserve at this hotel as my usual haunts were booked up.  Upon arriving my reservation was lost.  I wish I would've have left right then.  I was given a room on the club floor which I thought would give me the best experience and the room was 85 degrees (felt hotter) w a wall unit a/c that was loud.  After going several rounds w the keys not working I was given a new room that had a noisy a/c to the point I had to unplug it.  When I called to the front desk saying I thought I left a book in my old room the front desk agent was not helpful and never called back to say if the book was found or not.  He wasn't even nice.  The rooms are average to below average and the staff is poorly trained.  I had low expectations
Manager Response: Dear Jessica L,  I sincere apologize all the inconvenience that had happened to you. I have no word to say but I promise that I will definitely look into this matter and improve our service. Thanks for your time and feedback!

Summary: Shuttle drivers were the best. They were quite friendly and accommodating.  Rooms were good. I would recommend it for a family visit. Waiting period was a little long at the front desk at check in time. But all in all it was ok.
Manager Response: Dear Natalie A,  At The Hotel Fullerton we strive to exceed your expectations throughout your  entire visit. We offer free shuttle service to and from Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center, and Downtown Disney. We are very happy to hear that you have enjoyed our shuttle service and had commented as the BEST. Thanks for your time and feedback!

Summary: Booked a king room through Hotels.com. We arrived at 3 p.m. and were given a queen room even though I reminded them that I booked a king. Staff insisted we booked a queen. Once we got to our room, I looked up the email and went back to show them it was indeed a king so we had to move. We were unable to initially look it up because the promised free wifi didn't work (we ended up establishing our own hotspot from our phones for the entire stay). We asked about the code and were given a n.ew one - two more times. They never did work. Staff doesn't seem to be to quick to want to serve. My husband was on hold for about 5 minutes once before he finally gave up. The room itself was ok other than being very hot and stuffy. It would seem they might at least have the air on at the end of
Manager Response: Dear Amy L,  Thank you for taking the time to post your comments. I am pleased to know that you liked our rooms. However, I apologize for the level of service received, internet connection and air conditioning did not meet your expectations. All of our reviews are evaluated by our hotel management, and your review is no exception.   Once again many thanks for your feedback and we hope you will give us the opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Charisse V Case Manager IHGCare

Summary: Chose this hotel for its proximity to our daughters med school graduation. Did not read any reviews prior to our stay and had no expectations other than a room with a bed. Staff were welcoming and pleasant while accommodating our early arrival. Decor of hotel and room was modern, clean ,and comfortable. Easy access to the freeway and other amenities in the Fullerton / Brea area.
Manager Response: Dear Bigdiceguy,  At The Hotel Fullerton we strive to exceed your expectations throughout your  entire visit. Thanks for your time and feedback. We are so happy that your had enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your recommendation to all other future guests. Thanks!

Summary: I stayed at at the Hotel Fullerton on May 16, 2014, while attending the college graduation for my niece at CSUF.  I booked this hotel on Expedia based on reviews and pics.  This hotel was ok.  It aspires to be fancier than it is.  It looks like this used to be a Crowne Plaza and became an independent hotel.  The rooms were remodeled recently and have the standard dark wood furniture with flat panel tv, however, there are vestiges of the room prior to the remodel.  There are the acoustic ceilings and old ac unit in the wall by the balcony sliding door.   When I tried to put the ac on in my first room, it did not work.  Hotel maintenance arrived and said it was broken.  I had to switch rooms at 1:30 a.m.  The second room the ac worked, but those old wall units are super noisy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I found a great deal on a room here for a wedding I was attending down the street. I didn't expect much because of the lower price, but the place was LOVELY!! They're undergoing renovations and put us in a room away from them so we didn't get bothered by noise. The finishings were modern and updated, though the shelf in our shower was wobbly and on the brink of collapse. We didn't get to try the restaurants because they had restrictive hours, but they looked great. And while the location is odd, I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here in March of this year (2014) while attending the Natural Expo West Show for work. First off, the people who work here are very nice. That said, check in was very slow even though it wasn't that crowded. I don't know if they have an old system but it was painful. We booked through Booking.com and the girl at the desk couldn't find our reservation at all, nor could the manager who came over to help. Only after I handed over my phone where I pulled up the reservation in my email did they find our reservation on their system.   The room was ok, it was old and not overly clean. Obviously it has been awhile since the rooms were renovated. There were dirt stains on the pillows and the bathroom was not as clean as you find in other places. There was a dirty footprint in the
Manager Response: Dear Kravid,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your stay.  It is unfortunate the room conditions prevented you from fully enjoying your time at the hotel.  We are confident the necessary adjustments will be made, in order to achieve complete guest satisfaction.   Thank you again for your comments, we look forward to serving you in the future.   Sincerely,  Ben J Case Manager IHGCare

Summary: this hotel is clean and the people are very nice theres old lady there named sherri she helped me for my whole stay shes wonderful and very nice makes you feel right at home thank you sherri and The Hotel Fullerton for a wonderful stay i will return :)
Manager Response: "great" Thank you for your review, the top score and Sheri's mention. We have already begun to celebrate. Sheri will be the center of attention. Your review is very kind. We all thank you very much and cannot wait for you to return where we will have an opportunity to impress once more. Thank you "great" for your review and the love. We hope to see you again very soon. Tommy

Summary: Loved this hotel. Very easy to find, right off of the freeway. The Check in Staff was super nice and answered all of my questions and I had alot of them! lol The shuttle drivers to and from Disneyland were very helpful giving me directions to other places I wanted to go. I ate at the Bar and Grill, the Waitress/Bartender was fantastic! Beds were comfortable and it was really quiet. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: "Trip to See the Yankees” Thank you for the HOME RUN review. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. It is a thrill to read. We continue to make improvements and will work hard to earn your top score again. Our crew thanks you very much for your support. Please visit us again soon and remember to look for the Crowne Plaza Fullerton-Anaheim when you do. Thank you very much. Tommy

Summary: This was our second visit to the Hotel Fullerton and we will definitely be back.  We found their rooms very clean and well appointed,  their shuttles safe and comfortable with friendly,  accommodating drivers.    We are a Disney loving family and have stayed at a variety of hotels that shuttle to the Park.  By far this is the best one we have tried.    We want to especially thank Smit and Leo at the front desk for going the extra mile while we were checking in,  and Andrew in maintenance for going the extra mile in his area for us.   We watch for them to come up on Groupon and plan our Disney trips accordingly.   Thanks for the great stay.
Manager Response: "We will be back!!!" That is what we love to hear. Great Review. Leo, Smit and Andrew have been celebrated for days now. Our team really does thrive on your positive comments and I cannot tell you how far they go in maintaining perspective and moral. We are becoming a Crowne Plaza so upon your return please look for us under our new name Crowne Plaza Fullerton-Anaheim and I promise to continue to work with my team so that we are prepared to capture your top score once again. BTW - As a Crowne Plaza I will not be allowed to participate with Groupon but please rest assured that as part of the IHG system we do offer a lowest internet rate guarantee to assure travelers always get the best price directly from us guaranteed. You may also e-mail me at tommy.spencer@cpfullerton.com for a direct connect. Thanks again "We will be back" Is that a  Terminator reference? I love it. Thanks Tommy

Summary: Last week I went to Disneyland w a friend from NYC & stayed at the Hotel Fullerton the nite before. It has been 4 years since I have been to Disney, and its always really a special time. We checked into the hotel which is conveniently located directly off the 91 freeway. Our room was like a penthouse suite, with a King size bed fit for a Queen. The room also had a beautiful bathroom w cool recess lighting. There is lots of room w 2 sinks,  a desk, lounge chair, and a great big frig and TV. We always order room service, and the steaks were great, just like I was eating in a fancy steak house. We watched a great film. The view of the OC is great from the balcony w a view of the city lights. The bar downstairs is cool w a disco artsy vibe and great service, in beautiful leather
Manager Response: "Disneyland & Relaxing Hotel" Thank you, Thank you, Thank you. I do not know what else to say. Your review is incredibly kind and very supportive. We appreciate you so much. We have shared your review over and over again and will continue to use it as the example of excellence. This is our goal for every guest. Well as you know by now we are converting into a Crowne Plaza very soon. When you return please look for the Crowne Plaza Fullerton-Anaheim and rest assured we will be working even harder on your return so that we might earn your top score again. Thank you "Disneyland and Relaxing Hotel" for your review and your support. Tommy

Summary Heading: Just what me and my wife needed....
Summary: Our son was off to his grandparent's house 4 the weekend, so me and my wife decided we would get out of the house too since we hardly ever get chance 2......enter hotel fullerton.....this place is beatiful...we sat at their bar after checking in and had a few drinks...went back to our room, ordered room service, the food was better than i expected...the staff was wonderful...by the time checkout came, we honestly did not wanna get out of bed, i literally wanted to put that bed in my bag somehow b4 i left... It was that comfortable....whenever me and the wife get another chance to get away, hotel fullerton is where we're going to stay, hopefully we get more than 24Hrs....anybody want to baby sit for us?                              Mr and Mrs  Azzamonds
Manager Response: "Just what me and my wife needed" WOW. Thank you very much. I appreciate your comments and the top score very much. Stories like these are what keep hospitality employees going. We shared your story with our team and all were very happy. They realize that this is what it's all about sometimes. Kicking back with the family, having a wonderful experience with good food and drink. What else do need right? When you return please be sure to bring your swim suites as the hot tub and pool are very nice too and I know it will only enhance your experience. Thanks again "Just what me and my wife needed". We will see you next time. Tommy

Summary Heading: great little getaway.home away from home
Summary: The hotel fullerton was a great hotel.The manager named ancore is the best.My family which was my hubby and kids along with my mother in law, and sister and niece stayed there.The hotels hospitality is wonderful.Food was delicious.I recommend anyone who is staying with family to stay there.My family is very loyal and we dont have to further stay anywhere.We will continue to stay there at the hotel fullerton.Thanks Ancore for everything you do.Your the best.
Manager Response: “Great Little Home Away from Home" Thank you for your wonderful review, your continued loyalty and for the top score. Ankur and I celebrated his mention and used it to demonstrate that Ankur is leading the way in customer service. His team was inspired and Ankur really appreciated the recognition. As you may know when you return we will have become the Crowne Plaza Fullerton-Anaheim. There will be many new things. We will continue to work hard and will strive to earn another top score upon your return. Thank you so much. Tommy

Summary Heading: Needing a well to do vakay...
Summary: I'd just like to say what a great manager Ankur has been. My daughter and I wanted to get away, so we decided to stay at Hotel Fullerton.i just wanted to say staff has been helpful and Mr. Ankur such a help, and will be able to get the rest I need. Now if I had to stay at Hotel Fullerton again I would do it....Thanks again...
Manager Response: "Needing A Well To Do Vakay..." Thank you granting us your top score and for mentioning one of our team members. Ankur. This is a very nice honor. Ankur has already visited my office with a huge smile and your printed review in hand. We celebrated together and have begun to share with Ankur's team and the rest of the hotel. Now that's leading by example. Thanks Ankur! and Thank you "Needing a well to do Vakay..." for your very nice review. Your positive comments fuel our passion to deliver outstanding service. We will see you the next time your ready for a Vakay in CA! Tommy

Summary: We bought this hotel through the Groupon and we expected  something simple and cheap. But we were surprised! We stayed three nights. Clean quiet room with comfortable bed, new furniture and hard-working housekeeping. The front desk was helpful, they purchase e-tickets to Disneyland and gave us extra soap facilities. We will book the hotel in October! Thank you, guys!!!
Manager Response: "Nice Clean Hotel" This is what we like to see. Success! Thank you for awarding us your top score.   It sounds like the team did a great job. We will share and celebrate your review with the entire team. Especially those hard workers in Housekeeping and the responsive Front Desk. We will see you in October and will prepare hard to earn another top rating when you return. Enjoy the summer and thanks for taking the time to share your wonderful review. Tommy

Summary Heading: Nice Room- if your key works
Summary: The room was lovely but previous reviews were correct in warning about the slow service. My room was in the far corner on the 5th floor which also required an elevator key and my key never, ever worked. On Saturday, I went to the desk FOUR TIMES and never got a functioning key, often waiting in line for over 20 minutes with other people having the same problem. I finally begged someone to walk me up with a master key knowing I was checking out in the morning. I was attending for an academic conference and they could not provide me with a receipt or any documentation I had stayed there bc I booked through Travelocity. I travel a lot and have never had that problem, or the key issue. As a result I received no reimbursement from my university and had to pay out of pocket for this
Manager Response: "Nice Room if your Key Works" Thank you for your review and for saying Nice Room. Thank you. I am so sorry. I understand completely the frustration that comes when you arrive at your door so far away just to find the key does not work. The worst. Because of your review I have order a complete key system calibration and cleaning. Each door lock and key card encoder will be cleaned with a specially made cleaner and adjusted to assure a quick response. The test locks demonstrate that even if working properly this process helps. This will help to reduce these occurrences dramatically. As far as your receipt I do apologize. It would be impossible for me to provide a receipt for a TV purchased at Macy's from Penny's. Had you completed your purchase with us we would have the ability to simplify print a payment receipt. Because you did not purchase your room from us we do not know what you paid or have your payment information. You would need to get the receipt from the party you purchase from.. I  am sorry for the inconvenience but it simply out of our hands. You mention other reviews that talk about slow service. It is true. If you arrive at any of the peak times or behind a large group there may be a small delay but outside of these circumstances I think you will find our staffing and speed on par. If there are extraordinary delays I have been known to buy a drink or two so if you arrive during a hectic time and want to relax with a drink while you wait please simply ask for Tommy and I will take care of you. I am sorry for these inconveniences and can see when these problems are compounded can really ruin your experience. Please let me know when your return. I would like to handle you reservation personally and show you how good we are when we get it right. My e-mail is tommy.spencer@cpfullerton.com. Please let me know when you return to Fullerton-Anaheim. You will not regret it. Tommy

Summary: Would like to make an effort to compliment Leo from Front Desk. He has been very efficient and helpful throughout our group stay. His effort make us feel like home and thumps up for him. Would like to highlight to the hotel management that Leo makes a difference.
Manager Response: "Great Service - Leo" Thank you Great Service Leo. We appreciate you review very much and will share and celebrate. Leo is a wonderful team member and has a genuine concern for guest service and comfort. We are fortunate to have him on our team. Thank you for taking the time to let Leo know that he matters and letting us know that we should take note. Noted. Leo will get full credit. Thank you very much. Tommy

Summary: It's the worst hotel help they moved me rooms why I was at disneyland without telling me went to my room card didn't work with my stuff inside. Went to the front desk they told me got a key Went back still didn'twork went back got a new key had to pack.up moved half way thru my trip then new sink leaking yep no joke. Changed rooms again. this is not what I wanted to do on my trip. And found a razer blade in the hall way. no joke worsted hotel ever.  Stay away
Manager Response: "Bad Stay Run Away" I apologize for my delayed response to your review. Please do not run away. It is actually time to run back. I am fully aware of your situation and was involved in approving your sudden room change. This was an emergency that could not be avoided. I left very special instructions on what you were to receive and how we might make this surprise move a pleasant one. I was shocked to learn that my instructions were not followed and read your review. I would love a chance to explain in detail and have you return to make it up to you. Will you please e-mail me at tommy.spencer@cpfullerton.com please. I would really appreciate a chance to earn a five on your next review. Please. I am sorry. Thanks Tommy

Summary: Stayed here because it was close to Disneyland and man were we dissapointed. This has to be the most outdated, old and overpriced hotel I've ever stayed in. It's not a hotel... it's a motel with the price of a hotel. The pictures were very deceiving and I felt cheated when I got to the hotel and had already paid for the room. There's got to be a better option near Disneyland. Don't settle for the dreadful Fullerton MOTEL.
Manager Response: "Old not good" When I see reviews like this I am always surprised. We are a beautiful hotel with lovely grounds and unfortunately the pictures on line are all too real. The property has not invested in professional photography in the past so I assure you and all travelers you will get what you see. There is no trick photography here. I am sorry that we have lost your business but it sounds as if another hotel may suit you better upon your return. Thanks for giving us a try and I am truly sorry.

Summary: I just arrived to this hotel after 5 hrs driving and the check in took 20 minutes. Only 2 employees working in the front desk and they are super slow.   The price of my reservation was different in there system like 20% more than my reservation.   Outside of the section of my room is dirty and look like no one cares.   The room is clean and looks nice.
Manager Response: "Dirty, Slow Employees, Wrong Price" Ouch. I believe I was present during your check in. What you are saying is true.  We did fail you. I am sorry.  After so long on the road it is imperative to have a pleasant arrival. I have had several meetings since to discuss the breakdown, have identified the problem and have implemented the correction.  I will investigate the dirty outside and correct as well. I believe it was debris from the carpet installers that was not maintained over the weekend. I saw no evidence of a dirty outside this morning. I am sure it was cleaned up but possibly could have been done more often or with better care to preserve your experience. I have spoken with the carpet installers this morning as well. Thank you for the clean room compliment. The Housekeeping crew will enjoy getting a mention and you know they will let the Front Desk have it for a failed arrival. Thank you again. We will try harder to be better prepared for your arrival. Please try us again and I promise you will see the correction. Tommy

Summary: Valuable stay with complementary breakfast &drinks and nice service here. I met a really nice receptionist - Indra, she is knowledgeable for local activities and super patient for all the questions. Will definetly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: "Great Stay Here! Hello and thank you for the wonderful review. I know Indra will be super excited to have been mentioned and you can bet the entire team will celebrate. We appreciate the personal mention very much. We will continue to work hard and will be prepared for your return. We will convert to the Crowne Plaza Fullerton-Anaheim on or about May 1st so please be on the lookout.  "Great Stay Here". Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful review and we will see you next time. Thank You Very Much! Tommy

Summary: This was the second time that my group and I have stayed at this venue. We initially selected the Hotel Fullerton for a second year because of the reasonable room rates, convenient location, close proximity to the Fullerton College, and on/off access to the 91, 57, and 5 freeways. Upon arrival, the management team (Ankur Patel was my contact) were very hospitable, accommodating, and professional. The process of checking in our group of 25 guests was efficient, which allowed us more time to enjoy the pool, courtyard, and exercise amenities. Later that evening we also planned for a debrief session in a professionally set conference room. I strongly recommend this hotel for guests/groups visiting the colleges/universities in the area, or visiting any of the nearby Anaheim
Manager Response: "Fullerton Performing Arts School Trip" Thank you for your kind words, the wonderful review and your continued partnership. Thank you for making us your choice. When returning remember to look for the Crowne Plaza Fullerton-Anaheim. We enjoyed your group very much and are looking forward to your return. We will continue to make improvements and will work hard daily to assure you are even more impressed when you return. Thank you again for choosing us and the very nice review. Tommy

Summary: My husband and I used our groupon to stay here 3 nights. The staff is excellent, extremely courteous and don't mind all our questions. :) the free shuttle every hour to Disneyland is fantastic! (We went every day a few times a day) the room is beautiful and the bed is comfortable. Thank you!!
Manager Response: "Best Hotel Stay Ever" We appreciate you so much and are honored to have receive your highest score. It is very very nice to hear when we get it right and even better when we get it right multiple days in a row. That's really saying something. Your review is very kind. I hope you had a chance to enjoy the pool and our Griswold Bar as well. Both are popular watering holes. We will celebrate your review and use it as a reminder of how to do it well. Thank you very much. Tommy

Summary Heading: Staff needs to be trained better
Summary: I stayed the night of the 15th to the 16th. I got a really good deal on kayak that is why I chose to book here. I checked in to the hotel at 3:20pm and my room was not ready. The agent who checked me in was not really making conversation with me. I was not told about how the WIFI works even though that was supposedly included in the rate. I was not told about the shuttle services that were complimentary I was told about nothing. He did not even ask me if I had any questions.  I did not catch his name because their darn name tags had such small font. He checked me in anyway though and said that it would take 10 more minutes for my room to be ready and I said okay and I made my way slowly to my room. I do work in the hospitality industry and I do understand that sometimes we do
Manager Response: "Staff needs to be better trained" I cannot thank you enough. The problem is this. The staff is very well trained and as you point out the hotel is providing adequate resources to staff 4 desk agents. This type of service is not acceptable. I will use your review to create change TODAY! I have witnessed and received this type of service myself and it will not be tolerated. Anyone receiving this type of service at our hotel please contact me on my cell right away - 24 hours a day. 310 935 6339. Tommy Thanks "Staff needs to be better trained".

Summary: We visit Disneyland at least once a year with four generations of family ages 4 years to 78 years, and are Annual Passholders. The last of our 4 kids moved out, so this is the first vacation my husband and I have taken without kids in 20 years. We were looking for a hotel that could give us a less "frantic" experience than what we've had at the hotels along Disneyland row.   The front desk staff, although busy and training a newer employee, was helpful and friendly, printing out a map for us to follow to a restaurant that we wanted to try.   Our room was very neat and clean and was ready for us when we arrived.  After we checked into our room, we attempted to get all of our electronics connected to the free wifi, but experienced spotty reception. We had several employees trying
Manager Response: "Book This Hotel Now!". Thank you, Thank you, and Thank you. Your review is fantastic to read and even more fun to share. We will be even better when you return in September and cannot wait for the opportunity to impress. I cannot thank you enough for the top score. It is not something we take lightly and will promise to work even harder to earn your top score again upon your return. BTW - The carpet installers cut through a fiber optic internet line during your stay that killed our internet. I am very sorry about that. I know how important it is to stay connected. There should be no internet problems when you return. Thank you again "Book this hotel now!" We will see you in September and will work hard to earn a five again. Thanks Tommy

Summary: We stayed here for a family vacation. The free breakfast was nice and the front desk helpful, but was very run down. The rooms air conditioner was broken upon arrival and after they fixed it it still was not running right. The fridge is leaking. The fitness room has a weight machine but is not working. They have a free shuttle with friendly drivers but it books fast so if you don't book the previous day you won't be going to Disney very early. Also they are remodeling the rooms in my hall except for mine so a afternoon nap was completely impossible due to noise. Would not stay again.
Manager Response: "Broken" When I read reviews like this I wonder if there could be a mistake. I am very sorry that you had the experiences you did but rundown does not at all accurately describe us. I respect your opinion very much but would simply ask travelers reading this review to take a look at our pictures, web page and other resources to make your own assessment. You may just be pleasantly surprised. Thank you for the comments about the helpful staff. This is always good to hear. Complimentary shuttles to Disney do indeed fill fast. If you’re going to Disney sign up early and please be on time. Thanks again "broken" and I am sorry. We are making some adjustments to become a Crowne Plaza opening on May 1st. Will you return and give me a second chance to impress please? Send me an e-mail at tommy.spencer@cpfullerton.com and I will make the arrangements personally. Thanks and I hope to see you soon.

Summary: Had a little family gathering here. The rooms are nice but a little small, comfortable beds and nice shower. We stayed in a tower room on the back with a "balcony" which was very small. Also the lights from the parking lot were extremely bright all night and had to keep blackout curtains closed. The walls are very thin and the room next to us was very loud all night on our second night, thought they were in the room with us! Although the hotel is located in an industrial area it is within a few miles of Disneyland and other attractions (I believe they also have a shuttle though we did not use). They pool is decent and there is a very nice outside courtyard area off the bar. Also liked the bar, nice sitting area and lots of TVs! The staff was very pleasant and helpful. A very
Manager Response: "Great Value" Thank you for taking the time to share, thank you for the kind recommendation and thank you for recognizing our crew. We will continue to work hard and appreciate your kind words very much. I will investigate the back lights. There is always an answer and a bright light on a moon lite balcony just does not work for me. I will find an answer to preserve this experience. Thank you for mentioning our Griswold Bar. This as you can imagine is a very popular spot. Near the pool, near the courtyard, loaded with large screen TVs and of course all the fun you can handle. We are just a few miles from Disney and indeed provide complimentary transportation within 7 miles. Go to Disney, see a movie or simply get a free ride to one of Downtown Fullerton's many incredible restaurants. No need to drive when staying here. Thank you “Great Value” for everything and we will see you next time as the Crowne Plaza Fullerton-Anaheim. Tommy

Summary: When we got there we had a problem someone at the hotel cancelled our reservation I called my travel agent and had my confirmation number. The receptionist had told me to comeback around 2 when someone else  could help me I refused because I was scared that they would give all the rooms away. The 2 receptionist were very rude especially Araceli she had an attitude and was just rude. After getting our reservation all set the receptionist told me I couldn't check in until 3pm I arrived at noon the manager over heard her tell me that and said if they had rooms available to go ahead check me in..very nice manager he was very helpful.
